job_description:
About Spotnana

Spotnana is revolutionizing the $11 trillion global travel industry by rebuilding its outdated infrastructure with a modern, cloud-native Travel-as-a-Service platform. With over $115 million in funding from leading investors like ICONIQ and Madrona Venture Group, Spotnana is solving some of the most complex problems in travel, enabling seamless experiences for global enterprises and travelers alike. Here, you won’t just write code — you’ll be part of reimagining the foundation of travel technology. This is a place where impact begins on day one, with opportunities to ship production code that powers Fortune 100 companies and build cutting-edge AI experiences already live in production. Spotnana’s flat structure eliminates traditional hierarchy, empowering you to work alongside some of the best minds in the industry — engineers, product leaders, and technologists from the biggest tech companies in the world. We believe in building the future, committing to excellence, and staying stronger together. If you're looking for an environment that fosters rapid learning, deep ownership, and high-impact work — Spotnana is the opportunity you’ve been waiting for.

Our Core Values: Build the Future, Commit to Excellence, Stronger Together


You'll Build real, production grade systems

Forget working on features buried three layers deep. At Spotnana, you'll:

  • Design and develop scalable cloud-native backend services used by customers globally
  • Build APIs, data pipelines, and platform services that handle massive scale
  • Get direct customer exposure - see the real-world impact of your code immediately
  • Work with AI-assisted development tools to boost productivity and quality
  • Ship features that matter, not just incremental improvements

Learning that accelerates your career

Unlike big tech where you're siloed, here you'll:

  • Collaborate with tech leads, architects, and product managers on day one
  • Gain exposure to modern cloud architecture, distributed systems, and AI/ML in production
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and continuous integration with world-class engineers
  • Grow into advanced engineering roles faster than anywhere else

What you'll do

  • Design, develop, and maintain cloud-native backend services used by customers across the globe
  • Work with experienced engineers to build scalable APIs, data pipelines, and platform services
  • Apply core computer science fundamentals to solve real-world engineering problems
  • Write clean, well-tested, and maintainable code following best engineering practices
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and continuous integration processes
  • Collaborate with product managers, architects, and other engineers to deliver high-quality features
  • Learn and leverage AI-assisted development tools and data-driven insights to improve productivity and product quality
  • Collaborate across teams to deliver high-quality features that delight users

LIFE AT SPOTNANA: MORE THAN JUST CODE

  • Work-Life Balance: Hybrid model, recharge days, vacation time, Focus Fridays, company year end breaks
  • Culture & Community: We bring all Spotters together for international offsites — our latest one was in Bangkok! Experience our vibrant culture of connection, inclusion, and celebration — see the company post here.
  • Health & Wellness: 100% medical coverage, mental health support, gym discounts, wellness challenges
  • Financial Benefits: Competitive comp, equity ownership, financial wellness programs
  • Family Support: 26 weeks parental leave, childcare benefits, family medical coverage, disability insurance
  • Professional Growth: Learning budgets, transparent culture, decision-making empowerment, career development
  • Unique Perks: Legal services access, global mindset, respectful workplace culture.

job_description:
Key Role & Responsibilities

 

1. Training and Learning: METs will undergo a structured training program to familiarize themselves with the company's operations, products, and processes.

2. Assisting Senior Engineers: They work closely with experienced Mentors to learn from them and provide support in various engineering tasks.

3. Project Support: METs can be assigned to assist in ongoing projects, which can include research, design, analysis, and testing.

4. Problem Solving: They help in troubleshooting technical issues and problem-solving under the guidance of their Mentors.

5. Data Analysis: METs will be responsible for collecting and analyzing data to improve processes or products.

6. Research and Development: In some cases, METs may be involved in R&D projects to develop new products or improve existing ones.

7. Continuous Learning: Keeping up to date with industry trends, technology advancements, and best practices through further training and development.

8. Professional Development: Preparing for career advancement and gaining experience for future roles within the company.

job_description: We are looking for a creative Data Scientist to join our team and help train and fine-tune LLMs. In this role, you’ll work with large-scale data to build real products, analyze user behavior, and uncover opportunities that drive growth. Responsibilities include fine-tuning LLMs for Q&A, NLP, multi-labeling, image and emotion detection, as well as applying ML, NLP, and statistical methods to create predictive and prescriptive models. You’ll also investigate data quality and trends through visualization, and prepare data through cleansing, transformation, feature engineering, and handling complex, multi-variate datasets.

solutions.

● Experience within the Python Data Science ecosystem - NumPy, SciPy, Jupyter, 
etc. 
● BTech / MTech / MSc in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, 
Statistics, or other technical fields. Advanced degrees preferred.

job_description:
Roles & Responsibilities:

1. Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to extract insights from large datasets 

2. Work with stakeholders to identify key business problems and determine how AI can address them 

3. Implement and optimize machine learning models and algorithms 

4. Collaborate with data engineers to ensure data pipelines are robust and scalable 

5. Create dashboards and reports to communicate findings to business stakeholders 

6. Stay up to date with the latest AI trends and technologies to continually enhance 

Key skillsets required:

Mandatory Skills: 

· 0-3 years of experience preferred. 

· Bachelor's degree in computer science, analytics, mathematics, statistics is preferred, candidates with interest with other streams shall be considered too 

· The role primarily focuses on designing, developing, and deploying AI solutions to extract insights from large datasets. 

· Basic/Advanced Beginner experience in Python, SQL. Should be extremely comfortable with Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib and Scikit learn python libraries 

· Decent Python coding skills, expertise in AI/ML libraries, and proficiency with cloud platforms (Microsoft Azure, AWS or GCP) essential 

· Strong understanding of machine learning concepts and algorithms. 

· Python Coding Skills: Basic/Advanced Beginner in Python, with a focus on AI/ML libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn) 

· Basic knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure). 

· Basic exposure to statistical modeling, machine learning algorithms, and predictive analytics. 

· Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. 

· Ability to work in team-oriented, collaborative environment. 

· Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders

As a Backend Engineer at Nasiko, you’ll be responsible for building and maintaining high-performance backend systems using Golang/Python, while collaborating closely with ML and platform engineers to deploy AI-powered services and intelligent features.

You’ll design distributed infrastructure, optimize real-time inference pipelines, and create APIs that serve models and data at scale. Your work will directly support the development of AI-driven products and internal tooling across Nasiko’s core platform.

Skills and Qualifications

● Strong experience with Golang/Python.

● Solid understanding of distributed systems, concurrency, and network programming.

● Familiarity with machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, or JAX.

● Experience with model serving infrastructure (e.g., Triton Inference Server, TorchServe, ONNX Runtime, Ray Serve).

● Proficiency with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).

● Knowledge of MLOps tools (e.g., MLflow, Weights & Biases, Kubeflow, or Airflow).

● Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and infrastructure-as-code.

● Comfortable with databases (SQL/NoSQL), caching systems (Redis), and message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ).

● Strong Git and GitHub/GitLab workflows.

● Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is a plus.

job_description:
As a Research Scientist (Core AI) at Nasiko, you will shape the theoretical and architectural foundation of how autonomous agents think, reason, and coordinate across distributed environments.


You will:

● Advance multi-agent intelligence – Design algorithms and models that

enable autonomous agents to communicate, plan, and collaborate dynamically

in open, decentralized systems

● Develop scalable coordination frameworks – Create architectures for

decentralized goal alignment, conflict resolution, negotiation, and consensus in

large-scale, heterogeneous agent ecosystems

● Enable interoperability and discovery – Design mechanisms that allow

agents, services, and infrastructure components to discover each other, share

capabilities, and coordinate without centralized control

You'll work closely with platform and infrastructure engineers to translate research insights into production-grade capabilities that power the Nasiko agent layer – bridging the gap between cutting-edge theory and real-world distributed AI systems.

job_description:
Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high quality Reinforced Polypropylene Compounds, Thermoplastics Elastomers and Fibre Re-Enforced composites.

We presently operate through our three state-of-art manufacturing units situated at Puducherry, Pune (Chakan) and Manesar (Gurgaon). The units have a combines capacity of over 100,000 TPA. Our company is a TS- 16949 Certified company employing over 350 employees. We have approvals from all major Trans- National and Indian OEM’s Viz;. Tata Motors Limited, Renault Nissan, Etc. Subsequent to the acquisition of the company (Hydro S&S) by Kingfa, the Company has further ventured into manufacturing of Engineering Plastics like PBT (Used in Lighting, electrical application), Polyamides (Automotive, Electrical Applications) at its plant at Pune.

Education: MSc/M.Tech / B. Tech with no backlogs

job_description:
Purpose of role

We are looking to hire a passionate, hard-working and capable individual to accelerate vehicle product development by leveraging Machine Learning (ML), AI, and advanced analytics. The role focuses on creating surrogate and reduced-order models to reduce simulation run times, building predictive models from test and simulation data. This enables data-driven decision-making, improves efficiency, and shortens development cycles across R&D.


Key Responsibilities

•

Collaborate with internal teams to develop tools based on ML/AI that improve productivity and accelerate product development.

•

Develop ML-based surrogate and reduced-order models to accelerate simulation workflows for domains such as thermal, CFD, structural analysis etc.

•

Work closely with external partners to develop ML pipelines to accelerate product development.

•

Develop and deploy predictive analytics and machine learning models by integrating multi-source data (simulation, road tests, sensor signals) to generate actionable insights for component-level and system-level performance, enabling advanced analytics for informed decision-making.

•

Design, train, and deploy neural network models optimized for heterogeneous hardware (GPU, CPU) to ensure efficiency and scalability.

•

Work closely with stakeholders to enable rapid prototyping, feedback loops, and continuous improvement of ML solutions.

•

Maintain high technical standards through architectural design, code reviews, and best practices for model development.

•

Implement MLOps pipelines for seamless deployment and monitoring of models in production environments.

•

Working on language models (API) to crunch documents for insights.


Certification courses / Trainings / Project

•

Courses on Scientific Computing, Statistics and Probability, Machine Learning & Linear Algebra.

•

Worked on data analytics / ML modelling in BTP/MTP.

•

Worked on Machine learning/Data analytics during internships.

• Team player, co-ordinating between team members to complete the activity


Job Profile-System Design Engineer - 

1. System design of Supercomputers / HPC systems

2. Design of Compute Servers. High Speed Switches, Network Interface Cards

3. The design includes working with latest Server class processors from Intel, ARM etc. and Switch SOCs with serial links of 200 Gbps (56Gbps X 4) or more b/w, along with DDR4/5, PCIe4/5, Ethernet, NVMe drive interface etc.

4. Understanding, designing schematics for PCBs

5. All phases of design (Schematc capture, Compenent engineering, Library creation, place and route, Manufacturing data, Drawing) for Board disigns, Simulation and signal integrity applications on industry standard toolsets like Cadence Allegro, Mentor etc. Multi-layer High Speed PCB design DFM and DFT, EMI/EMC etc.

job_description:
About Miko:

Miko is an advanced consumer robotics innovation lab and deep-tech company founded by young, dynamic entrepreneurs from IIT Bombay. Our mission is to bring Robotics and AI into every consumer home.

We are a global deep tech company with offices in the US, UK, and India, and a customer base across 140+ countries. Miko offers the first-of-its-kind "content on subscription" hardware platform for kids, powered by patented technology.

Our flagship products, Miko 3 and Miko mini (www.miko.ai), are playful learning robots that engage, educate, and entertain. These robots feature a proprietary emotional intelligence and adaptive personality engine, complex conversational and multilingual AI, and advanced speech/vision recognition built over an autonomous navigation system.

The Miko team is an interdisciplinary group of experts spanning electronics, embedded systems, mechanical, robotics and AI engineering, HRI/UI/UX design, cloud/mobile software, content creation, neuropsychology, and global business mavericks.

We are looking for a Jr. AI Image Processing Engineer in the team. In this role, you will be engaged in the research, design, development and optimization of state-of-the-art vision & image processing algorithms and models for creating a robust user experience on Miko series of robots. We expect you to have strong coding, mathematical, signal processing and implementation skills with expertise in python deep learning frameworks. 

Work Experience & Qualifications: No restrictions on degree/qualifications; only skills matter. 

Responsibilities: 

• Develop production ready edge and cloud frameworks for applied AI algorithms including end-to-end facial analysis pipeline, person identification & re-identification, scene understanding and reconstruction, gesture & activity recognition.

• Improvise existing AI & robotics stack, design new features and develop state of the art algorithms such as generative image & video modules, multi-user recognition, facial emotion analysis, scene classification/summarization/remembrance and others. 

• Design, implement and optimize large scale data processing and continuous training pipelines for various vision tasks on a single/distributed GPU system to accelerate model training development cycles. 

• Consistent coordination and collaboration with the AI backend, Robotics and QA teams for efficient development cycles and testing for new features and improvements. 

• Ensuring timely releases, maintenance and scaling of services in the production environment. 

Requirements & Skills: 

• Excellent understanding and familiarity with the Pytorch/Tensorflow framework. 

• Experience with Visual GANs and techniques for synthetic image generation, augmentation, Summarization and enhancements. 

• Strong understanding of fundamentals of image pre-processing such as normalization, histogram equalization, scaling/interpolation, geometric transformations, color/exposure correction, contrast adjustment, deblurring and denoising. 

• Proficiency in camera calibration and frame of reference transformations. 

• Experience with image processing techniques and models such as segmentation, face/person detection, face recognition/person re-identification, tracking and object detection. 

• Experience with facial landmark extraction and head pose estimation algorithms.

• Experience with Large multimodal models with image input, text-to-image and image-to-image models, generative image editing, prompt & context engineering.

• Understanding of model compression/optimization/quantization techniques for faster inference on edge/embedded devices as well as cloud GPUs is a plus.

• Excellent understanding of lower level fundamentals of deep learning models such as layer details, attention, normalization, backpropagation, and optimizers. 

• Experience in transfer learning and fine-tuning of deep learning models as well as designing architectures from scratch. 

• Good understanding of CPU-GPU transfers, CUDA usage, GPU architectures, concepts of pipelining and multiprocessing as well as latency/throughput bottlenecks during training of neural networks. 

• Ability to read and implement related academic papers in the image processing domain. 

• Proficiency in data science/image processing libraries/frameworks such as OpenCV, Sklearn, Numpy, Scipy. 

• Proficiency with Vision Transformers architecture is a plus. 

• Proficiency with Dockers, Linux OS and basic Bash scripting.

job_description:
Data Analyst

We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join our vibrant and fast-growing Data Analytics team. This role is an excellent opportunity for recent graduates who are eager to begin their career in data analytics and contribute to impactful business decisions.

Key Responsibilities:

·      Collect, clean, and preprocess data from various internal and external sources.

·      Analyse datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that support business strategies.

·      Build and maintain dashboards and reports using tools such as Excel, Power BI, or Tableau.

·      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support data-driven decision-making across product, credit, and operations.

·      Perform basic statistical analysis to interpret data and provide actionable insights.

·      Assist in evaluating product performance, tracking KPIs, and supporting analytical initiatives.

·      Participate in A/B testing, performance tracking, and other analytical experiments.

·      Contribute to process improvements by identifying gaps and recommending data-backed solutions.

 

What we’re looking for:

·      Bachelor’s degree in technology or a related field.

·      Proficiency in SQL and MS Excel; working knowledge of Python or R.

·      Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Power BI or Tableau.

·      Strong analytical mindset, attention to detail, and problem-solving ability.

·      Ability to present data insights clearly through reports, charts, and dashboards.

 

Career Progression Path

We are committed to supporting continuous development and offering a transparent growth pathway for all new joiners. The career progression for this role is structured as follows:


Analyst Trainee — On Joining

Role Focus:

·      Learn foundational analytics skills, tools, and processes

·      Support basic data cleaning, reporting, and dashboard updates

·      Work closely with senior team members to understand business data and reporting needs

Development Goals:

·      Build competency in Excel, SQL, and data visualization tools

·      Gain hands-on experience with internal systems and workflows

·      Demonstrate reliability, learning agility, and attention to detail

 

Analyst — After Successful Completion of Probation (6 Months)

Role Focus:

·      Independently manage routine analysis and reporting

·      Identify trends, validate data accuracy, and present insights

·      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements

Development Goals:

·      Strengthen analytical problem-solving capability

·      Develop end-to-end ownership of assigned dashboards/reports

·      Improve communication and presentation of data insights

 

Senior Analyst — Upon Completion of 2 Years

Role Focus:

·      Lead complex analysis projects with minimal supervision

·      Mentor Analyst Trainees and Analysts

·      Design scalable dashboards, data models, and automation solutions

·      Provide thought leadership and influence data-driven decision-making

Development Goals:

·      Build advanced skills (Python, cloud data tools, statistical modelling, etc.)

·      Take ownership of high-impact analytics initiatives

·      Develop leadership and stakeholder-management capabilities

 

About Kissht:

Kissht, a Great Place to Work® certified organization, is a consumer-first credit app that is transforming the landscape of consumer credit. As one of the fastest-growing and most respected FinTech companies, Kissht is a pioneer in data and machine-based lending. With over 15 million customers, including 40% from tier 2 cities and beyond, we offer both short and long-term loans for personal consumption, business needs, and recurring expenses.

Founded by Ranvir and Krishnan, alumni of IIT and IIM, and backed by renowned investors like Endiy Partners, the Brunei Investment Authority, and the Singapore Government, Kissht is synonymous with excellence in the industry. Join us and be a part of a dynamic, innovative company that is changing the future of financial technology.

job_description:
Barco designs technology solutions to enable bright outcomes around the world. Seeing beyond the image, we develop visualization and collaboration solutions to help you work together, share insights, and wow audiences. Our focus is on three core markets: Enterprise (from meeting and control rooms to corporate spaces), Healthcare (from the radiology department to the operating room), and Entertainment (from movie theaters to live events and attractions). We have a team of 3,600 employees, located in 90 countries, whose passion for technology is captured in 400 granted patents.

 

Our vision is to be a world-class software team partnering with our businesses to offer successful software solutions and outcomes that delight our customers and set the trend in our dynamic markets

 

 

The Software Engineer will design, develop, and implement new ideas and products for software applications and solutions. He/she will be accountable for anticipating and resolving problems that impact design of current or developing products. He/she will perform the research, design, definition and implementation of the product software applications.

 

You will be working on one more of the following JavaScript frameworks and front-end technologies: AngularJS, ReactJS, VueJS as part of application development team. We use AWS and Microsoft Azure as our cloud platform for most of our cloud apps. To deploy the apps in cloud, you will be working on Docker, Kubernetes, HelmCharts in addition to CI/CD tools like Jenkins, Ansiblem Terraform. If you are passionate about automation testing, We will help you learn Python, Selenium, cucumber and Robot Framework.

 

Essential Duties & Responsibilities

 

·      Development and testing of new software applications and solutions.

·      Builds and assembles prototype assimilations of software applications and solutions as directed.

·      Coding, completes programming and debugs software applications and solutions.

·      Assist in delivering high quality software applications and solutions that are extensible and scalable within the specified timeline.

·      Demonstrate creativity in identifying effective approaches to software and solution development process and promote opportunities for product innovation.

·      Identify product requirements and potential improvements and discuss them with the Product Development Manager.

·      Participate in the complete software development life cycle from requirement gathering to deployment of the product.

·      Write and review documentation needed for installation, usage and maintenance of applications and solutions.

·      Cultivate strong working relationships with co-workers.

·      Undertake any other assignments for which the company’s management may request your participation from time to time .

 

The above responsibilities are intended to describe the general nature, essential functions and level of work being performed by individuals assigned to this position.

Reasonable modifcation will be made basis the desired need to perform the essential job functions.

 

Pre-Requisites:

  • Strong development, debugging and testing skills
  • Team oriented, motivated and eager to learn new technologies. Able to easily integrate into local/International team.
  • Critical thinker and problem solving skills
  • Capabilities to have end-to-end system thinking
  • Self-motivated and result oriented, autonomous worker, team player
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Open to travel for short duration

job_description:
Analog/Mixed-Signal Design Engineer focusing on high-performance analog to-digital and digital-to-analog converters. The successful candidate in this role will design high performance transistor level circuits starting from initial specification, through design and layout supervision, silicon evaluation and characterization to final product introduction to market.

Qualifications

 B.Tech/M.Tech/PhD in Electronics and Electrical engineering

 Familiarity with high-speed, high-resolution analog-to-digital (ADC) or digital-to-analog (DAC) data converter design and building block circuits such as bandgap reference, op-amp, comparators, oscillators, DLL, PLL etc.

 Strong intuitive and analytical understanding of transistor-level circuit design including noise and mismatch analysis

 Experience with analog and digital behavioral modeling

 Familiar with Cadence schematic capture, virtuoso, Spectre and/or HSPICE circuit simulation tools

 Must be familiar with layout parasitic extraction tools and layout dependent impairments in advanced CMOS processes

 Must be able to work independently, create and adhere to schedules

 Must possess strong written and verbal communication skills with an ability to work with teams spread across geographic locations

 Should be able to seek help proactively

Digital/Mixed-Signal Design Engineer focusing on high-performance analogto-digital and digital-to-analog converters. Job responsibilities include development and verification of the digital circuits for high performance data converters, behavioral modeling, customer support, and assisting with synthesis and place-and-route

Qualifications

 B.Tech/M.Tech/PhD in Electronics and Electrical engineering

 Good knowledge of Verilog RTL coding including state machines, adders, multipliers, combinatorial logic, etc

 Good understanding of digital design for mixed signal control loops and designing Verilog code to control analog circuits (e.g. digital backend for ADC, digital PLL, etc)

 Familiarity with behavioral Verilog code, including wreals

 Ability to write thorough testbenches

 Preferred knowledge of synthesis tool

 Basic understanding of SystemVerilog and assertions preferred

 Familiarity with place and route tool flow preferred but not mandatory

 MATLAB understanding would be preferred but not mandatory

 Deep understanding of constraints, especially for mixed-signal designs, including multiple clock domains and clock gating

job_description:
Mechanical Design Engineer


Team to deliver design and Integration of Aero engine components and assemblies – Apply principles product safety, robust design, system engineering, DFX and producibility. Work with the Integrated project team in a collaborative environment to mature the design through gated technical reviews, securing buyoffs by demonstrating that the physical and functional solutions provided achieve the desired product requirements and attributes such as life, cost, weight, serviceability. Deliver definitions for manufacturing – this may be done in the traditional drawings or Model Based Definitions whilst complying to the customer operating procedures and best practices.


Key Responsibilities


  • You may need to Integrate physical design solution at module level and / or with the owners of nonphysical data functional such as Air Systems, Oil Systems, aerothermal, Performance, etc.
  • A on need basis, address the arisings from the fleet and perform route cause investigation to help improve the safety, Reliability and Availability; Also assess impact on the component assemblies based on changes to the understanding of the engine operating conditions.
  • Knowledge of gas turbine components or an understanding of material, thermal, mechanical, and dynamic issues associated with the core turbomachinery components / modules (such as Compressor, combustion, Rotative discs, casings, structures, Turbine Statics, shafts etc.) may be advantageous.
  • Achieve the Right First Time and On Time Delivery targets planned deliverables in design to make. You will also work towards developing optimized high quality code deliverables, continual knowledge management and adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
  • Prior Experience of working in the gas Turbine Product, Aviation industry or within the APQP/PPAP framework (Aerospace Standard AS9145) may be advantageous.
  • Strong desire for continuous self-improvement, and Improvement of processes
  • Ability to Apply analytical creative thinking to solve technical problems.
  • Good communication and presentation skills; Ability to articulate complex topics with people at all levels of the organization and customers.
  • Knowledgeable on the usage of Product Lifecycle Management (e.g., Teamcenter) and Modelling software (e.g.: UG NX)



Product Definition Engineer


To be part of the team with experience of modelling, drafting and MBD on a variety of complex components and sub-assemblies in core turbomachinery domain (such as Compressor, combustion, Rotative discs, casings, structures, Turbine Statics, shafts etc.) may be advantageous.


Key Responsibilities


  • Deliver Geometrical definitions for engineered product- This may need you to create 3D models, Digital Assemblies, General Arrangements drawings, sections, Models for stress analysis, etc.
  • Deliver the manufacturing Instructions whilst complying to the customer operating procedures and best practices. This may be done via traditional drawings or Model Based Definitions 
  • Interact with Designers, Manufacturing to deliver the FM objectives including producibility.
  • Achieve the Right First Time and On Time Delivery targets planned deliverables in design to make. You will also work towards developing optimized high quality code deliverables, continual knowledge management and adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
  • GD&T ASME Y14.5 and Understanding of Mass Properties
  • Knowledgeable on the usage of Product Lifecycle Management (e.g.: Teamcenter) and Modelling software (e.g.: UG NX)
  • Strong desire for continuous self-improvement, and Improvement of processes



Mechanical Integrity Engineer


Mechanical Integrity (stress) engineers ensure the integrity of gas turbine products. Opportunity to work across a wide variety of commodities (Fan, Compressors, Casings, Structures, Combustor, Turbines) design function by undertaking analysis of the proposed designs and in-service issues to ensure that they are robust and that they meet requirements. predict the mechanical behaviour of components and sub-systems considering various failure mechanisms (e.g., proof, ultimate, fatigue (low & high cycle), creep etc.) and contributing factors (e.g., vibration, thermal induced loads, inherent manufacturing anomalies, corrosion, extreme operating conditions such as blade out, over-speed, over pressure and burst duct etc.).


Key Accountabilities


  • Conduct Mechanical Analysis and Design of Experiments to ensure the integrity of products.
  • To resolve problems through engineering judgements. 
  • Work as part of a multi discipline teams to ensure new designs are fit for purpose (cost, weight, performance, manufacturability etc.).
  • To actively promote, encourage and support the identification and implementation of continuous improvements (of tools, processes, and methods) both within and outside their immediate sphere of influence and take prompt action across the wider team.
  • The ability to effectively communicate the method and results of complex analyses to peers, senior colleagues, and external organisations such as customers or regulatory bodies.
  • An understanding of material behaviour, crack propagation, contact, thermo-mechanical fatigue, and statistics.
  • Experience of, or a good appreciation of, finite element stressing techniques (SC03, Abaqus, Ansys, LS-Dyna), complex meshing (Hypermesh, Unigraphics etc) and data storage (Teamcenter).
  • An ability to apply logical, analytical, and innovative thinking on a range of technical problems and make balanced decisions across technical and business parameters.
  • Knowledge and experience of product integrity, liability, and aerospace certification frameworks. 
  • To be a point of contact within a given engineering discipline and to share subject matter knowledge across the function.


Rotatives Lifing Engineer

Team is responsible for Rotative Component Lifing for Aero Engine that helps discover and define the problem statement, evaluates the solution options, and makes recommendations. One will perform lifing of various Turbomachinery components, ownership of critical parts lifing and disc NPI along with modifications.

Key Accountabilities


  • Concept design and detailed design of turbo machinery components (especially Gas Turbine) with very good proficiency in lifing analysis.
  • Exposure or Experience in CAE platforms like ABAQUS with very good meshing and complex analysis capabilities.
  • Experience in mechanical integrity assessments, like Structural, Thermal, Transient, Creep, Fatigue, and their interactions.
  • Analytical and Communication skills, Planning and Co-ordination skills




Thermofluids Engineer

 

The team is responsible for the design, analysis, integration, and validation of whole engine thermal and fluid systems. These include the secondary air system, oil system, fuel system, and thermo-mechanical analysis. The team leads the understanding, integration and management of these systems and attributes, whilst providing predicted and analysed information to all areas of the business for the design and validation of engine systems, sub-systems, and components. 


Key Accountabilities


  • Requirements capture, concept design, modelling, analysis and assessment of air, oil, fuel, and heat management systems. 
  • System modelling using 1D network solvers, Finite Element Analysis and CFD, test planning, test execution and analysis to validate and achieve system requirements.
  • Delivering defined technical packages and investigations against programme milestones, within agreed cost, timescale, and quality requirements. 
  • Being a point of contact in your engineering discipline and sharing subject-matter knowledge with both internal and external customers. 
  • Production and in-service engine support.
  • Actively promoting, encouraging, and supporting continuous improvement, in and outside your immediate sphere.



Structural System Design (SSD) Engineer


Structural System Design (SSD-WEM) –The Structural System Design (Whole Engine Modelling) is responsible to architect, evaluate and optimize the structural design of the Jet-Engine by designing for Operational Loads, Vibrations and ensure the engine integrity is unaffected due to any of the unforeseen Extreme Events (Fan Blade Off, Bird Strike etc. ). The group engages in all stages of the engine's life starting from optimizing the architecture at the basic design concept stage, right up to the engine and aircraft certification, also supporting various in-service special requests / issues.


Key Accountabilities


  • Producing and analysing structural finite element models of the whole engine, comprising components that are modelled both by engine manufacturer, and by the air framer, subcontractor, or supplier. 
  • Using these models for both static (flight manoeuvre) and dynamic analyses to general loads, displacements and/or accelerations. 
  • Conducting Rotor dynamics or shaft whirling analyses to assess the engine's sensitivity to rotor unbalance. 
  • Predicting the structural response of an engine to the loss of a fan blade - known as Fan Blade Off (FBO) - and the effects on the engine and aircraft as the fan continues to rotate as a windmill during the flight home. 
  • Validating the models using measured data from tests on components or the whole engine. 
  • Collaborating as necessary with other departments in clients, and with suppliers, partners, and the aircraft manufacturers.


Performance Engineer


An opportunity exists to join the Performance and Aerothermal Team (P&AS) Team working for Infosys Bangalore and Mysore client dedicated centres. Performance Engineers act as whole engine integrators of propulsion system functional design liaising with multiple stakeholders. The team is responsible for the design, prediction and understanding of the Steady State and Transient behaviour of engines, engine performance verification (including engine test support and analysis) and developing Performance Methods and Tools.


Key Accountabilities


  • Gathering sub-system predictions of component behaviour for integration into system level predictions using thermodynamic models
  • To develop and maintain a functional understanding of the propulsion system of the propulsion system e.g., compressor stability, combustion stability, controls system requirements and behaviour.
  • To define requirements, support, analyse and report on engine performance verification tests.
  • To maintain and develop toolsets, models, and data in accordance with the needs of the project and the performance function.
  • Delivering defined technical packages and investigations against programme milestones, within agreed cost, timescale, and quality requirements.
  • Being a point of contact in your engineering discipline and sharing subject-matter knowledge with both internal and external customers.
  • Production and in-service engine support.
  • Actively promoting, encouraging, and supporting continuous improvement, in and outside your immediate sphere.



Systems Design Integration Engineer

 

An opportunity exists to join the System Design Integration (SDI) Team working for Infosys Bangalore and Mysore client dedicated centres. In this role, you will be responsible for the design and integration of systems on the product, ensuring that the design is robust and providing technical leadership on a wide range of challenging whole engine activities. Typically, this involves leading or working with diverse interdisciplinary teams made up of individuals from across client’s organisation.

 

Key Accountabilities


  • Leading whole engine integration activity - working with, and influencing, technologists from across the organisation to deliver system solutions at whole engine level. 
  • Leading activity to solve whole engine problems emanating from design review, bench testing or flight testing.
  • Leading activities associated with engine safety - working to ensure closure of SARs and other safety related issues. 
  • Designing the product and managing complex interfaces. 
  • Liaising with the airframer, to provide representation on engine/airframer interface issues. 

 

 


  • Support Engine Development Program (EDP) on all aspects of Turbine Aerothermal, like instrumentation requirements, test planning, pre and post-test activities.
  • Support New Product Introduction (NPI) project teams by delivering assessments on time to help meet project timelines.
  • Support safety issues by doing required level of analysis and substantiating decisions/findings in global forums.
  • Support Methods improvement and Research and development activities.
  • Communicate clearly and collaborate efficiently with global Aerothermal Engineers. Document design and analysis work in clear technical presentations and reports.

job_description:
PharmaACE is a growing Global Healthcare Consulting Firm, headquartered in Princeton, New Jersey. Our expert teams of Business Analysts, based across the US, Canada, Europe, and India, provide Analytics and Business Solutions using our worldwide delivery models for a wide range of clients. Our clients include established, multinational BioPharma leaders and innovators, as well as entrepreneurial firms on the cutting edge of science. We have deep expertise in Forecasting, Business Analytics, Competitive Intelligence, Sales Analytics, and the Analytics Center of Excellence Model. Our wealth of therapeutic area experience cuts across Oncology, Immunoscience, CNS, CV-Met, and Rare Diseases. We support our clients' needs in Primary Care, Specialty Care, and Hospital business units, and we have managed portfolios in the Biologics space, Branded Pharmaceuticals, Generics, APIs, Diagnostics, Packaging & Delivery Systems.

Purpose of Role

• Support leading global pharmaceutical clients and internal stakeholders by developing forecasts and market assessments for varied business cases needs in an onshore/offshore setting, as required

• Conduct risks & opportunity assessments for existing and pipeline products (pre-defined product to start with- in oncology or other medical space)

• Stakeholder Management – setting clear expectations on quality of deliverables & timelines

Responsibilities: 

• Perform in-depth market research and analyze data to derive understanding of the disease based on client requirements.

• Monitor and create Drug and Disease Forecast models on various therapeutic areas based on bottom to top approaches. Recommend actions by analyzing and interpreting data, thus conducting comparative analyses.

• Qualitative and Quantitative Analyses, Data mining, business intelligence, and valuation for arriving at conclusive analysis for various therapeutic areas of client interest. Converting models into reports and presentations for effective utilization by clients.

• Analyze, interpret, and synthesize learning from primary and secondary research sources, drawing conclusions that are actionable, impactful, and accessible to stakeholders for monitoring competition/indications/market/regulatory environment that can impact the product

• Present information and insights as presentable reports (PowerPoint/ Word/ Excel) for effective utilization by clients

• Proactively identify business challenges/opportunities and work closely with the team to develop research objectives, select methodologies, plan research projects, write and program questionnaires, and complete analysis and reporting

• Collaborate with the team on understanding the business questions based on the indication nuisances in detail

• Quality & Governance: Follow healthcare data privacy and model documentation standards; contribute to code reviews and QA

Report preparation

Quality control check for the reports covering:

• Content – language and accuracy of the data

• Consistency of terminologies

• Formatting

• Hyperlinks

• Conformance to all established processes and operating procedures covering execution quality, reporting etc.

KRA s - Performance Measures

• Quality of the Project executed

• Adherence to timelines

• Client satisfaction

• Compliance to organizational processes

Qualifications Required

• Strong interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills

• Strong attention to detail, with a quality-focused mindset

• Analytic problem-solving skills, with a creative and innovative outlook

• Independent, creative and driven quantitative thinker

• Ability to dive deep into business processes, data, and analytics

• Proficiency in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn) and comfort with SQL

• Basics of statistics and machine learning (Regression, Classification) would be an added advantage

• Good to have: Exposure to models like XGBoost, Random Forest, Logistic, Linear & Bayesian Regression models, Time Series Models (ARIMAx, SARIMAx)

Other competencies

• Ability to work independently, demonstrating initiative and flexibility through effective and innovative teamwork

• Innovative and collaborative behavior

• Customer centricity

• Proven data gathering and analytical skills

• Utilizes basic scientific or engineering principles and techniques to undertake short-term fairly specific tasks and Sub-projects.
  • Perform in-depth analyses in collaboration with technical staff. The Incumbent may supervise work of Research Assistants during project assignments.
  • Incumbent's Daily progress is under close supervision, particularly during first 6 months in position and subject to review before action is taken. Incumbent’s findings are frequently checked for accuracy and incorporated as part of project’s conclusions.
  • Propose and implement experimental, analytical and methodologies, in order to identify the best possible solutions for our customers
  • Tasks defined in nature and scope, entering areas of product development/improvement, production processes, and new knowledge research
  • Tasks are limited to one dimension of a medium project or to sub projects.
  • Establish and supervise scientific collaborations with both national and international academic and/or industrial partners (PhD theses, postdocs and start-ups).
  • Work effectively and cooperatively with our customers in a multidisciplinary and international industrial environment.
  • Support and/or coordinate R&D plant (or pilot) scale trials.
  • Communicate on your R&D activities on a regular basis.
  • Reports to Research Group Leader or individual contributor
  • In this role you are expected to Proactively Communicate and able to collaborate with internal and external stakeholders

job_description:
Purpose

To accelerate vehicle product development by leveraging Machine Learning (ML), AI, and advanced analytics. The role focuses on creating surrogate and reduced-order models to reduce simulation run times, building predictive models from test and simulation data. This enables data-driven decision-making, improves efficiency, and shortens development cycles across R&D.

o

Responsibilities:

•                 Collaborate with internal teams to develop tools based on ML/AI that improve productivity and accelerateproduct development.

•                 Develop ML-based surrogate and reduced-order models to accelerate simulation workflows for domainssuch as thermal, CFD, structural analysis etc.

•                 Work closely with external partners for developing ML pipelines to accelerate product development

•                 Develop and deploy predictive analytics and machine learning models by integrating multi-source data(simulation, road tests, sensor signals) to generate actionable insights for component-level and system-levelperformance, enabling advanced analytics for informed decision-making.

•                 Design, train, and deploy neural network models optimized for heterogeneous hardware (GPU, CPU) toensure efficiency and scalability.

•                 Work closely with stakeholders to enable rapid prototyping, feedback loops, and continuous improvement ofML solutions.

•                 Maintain high technical standards through architectural design, code reviews, and best practices for modeldevelopment.

•                 Implement MLOps pipelines for seamless deployment and monitoring of models in production environments.

•                 Working on language models (API) to crunch documents for insights

Atoms, Bits, Coulombs (ABC) Program:

How do you leverage technology to make real, tangible things in a fast, inexpensive, and energy-efficient manner?

This is the defining question of our age.

LOHUM seeks to cultivate a generation of leaders to tackle this very problem through the ABC Program. We are looking for smart, young, and talented folks who can think of solutions from A, B, and Cs i.e. first principles.

A year in the ABC Program:

  1. ABC Fellows will undergo a rigorous 12-month training itinerary.
  2. They will get exposure to multiple
  3. Functions - Engineering, Production, R&D, Operations, Business,
  4. Business verticals - Recycling, Refining, Energy Storage, Software
  5. This will be achieved through a series of 3-to-6-month time-bound projects.
  6. Each of these projects will be under the guidance of an experienced mentor

At the end of the 12 months, the ABC Fellows will be assigned permanent roles based on their inclination and performance.

Responsibilities:

1. Drive the assigned projects to logical conclusions within the given time frame.

2. Analyze learnings from each of the projects and recommend next steps.

3. Develop an understanding of how the company functions.

4. Engage with cross-functional teams to drive innovative solutions.

5. Learn extensively from experts and proactively develop skills & knowledge-base.

 

Required Skills:

1. Strong technical expertise in one or more areas of engineering and/or sciences.

2. Thinking - logical, from first principles, rigorous but being open to new ideas.

3. Being data-oriented.

4. Ability to work independently.

5. The ability to comprehend aspects both below and above your operational layer.

6. Excellent spoken and written communication.

7. Versatility for multi-disciplinary cooperation & cross-functional collaboration. 

 

Candidate Learning:

Exposure to and understanding of

1. Global Critical Minerals Value Chain

2. Chemical Processes and Scaling Challenges

3. Energy Storage Industry

4. Lithium-ion Battery Circular Economy

5. International Business (and potential opportunities to travel and live across India and the world)

job_description:
Job Overview:

 

We are seeking highly motivated and adaptable Post Graduate Engineer Trainees (PGETs) to join our dynamic aerospace & defense company. As a PGET, you will embark on a challenging and rewarding journey, gaining hands-on experience and contributing to critical projects across various functions.

 

We are looking for individuals who:

  • Are passionate about the aerospace & defense industry.
  • Have a strong desire to contribute to India's technological advancements.
  • Are eager to learn and grow in a challenging and rewarding environment.

 

As a PGET, you will have the opportunity to:

  • Work on cutting-edge projects and technologies.
  • Gain hands-on experience in various functions.
  • Receive mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.
  • Develop your technical and leadership skills.
  • Build a successful career in the aerospace & defense industry.

 

As an Avionics trainee, you will be,

  • Responsible to study and understand the system by going through requirements and design documents.
  • He/she is involved in systems integration, troubleshooting and testing on UAV.
  • Is required to review the testing of the existing designs and further assist in installation of the same;
  • Understand requirement properly and identify the appropriate equipment that would rightly fit the requirement compare and conduct analysis amongst the various alternatives available; troubleshoot any issues that come up
  • Carry cost estimation keeping budget; carry out obsolescence study, suggest and implement the changes in existing design; technical & compliance evaluation of the equipment, vigorous electrical & mechanical laboratory testing of the inputs received from the manufacturer, ensure factory acceptance test and site acceptance test
  • Develop an integration plan, setup integration facility & integration of equipment procured; carry out flight evaluation along with team; construct verification cross reference matrix

 

Roles may include (but not limited to):

  • Understanding of concepts of Avionics standards
  • Familiarity with Aerospace / Avionics design / simulation software
  • Knowledge of Aerospace components and Systems                                       
  • Fulfill pre-defined projects for the particular- rotation

 

Skills we are looking for:

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Adaptability to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
  • Willingness to learn and take on new challenges.

 

Note: The specific role assigned to you as a PGET will depend on your skills, interests, and the organization's requirements. We value flexibility and adaptability, and encourage you to explore various areas within the company to find the best fit for your career aspirations.

 

Join us in shaping the future of aerospace & defense in India!

job_description:
Job Overview:

 

We are seeking highly motivated and adaptable Post Graduate Engineer Trainees (PGETs) to join our dynamic aerospace & defense company. As a PGET, you will embark on a challenging and rewarding journey, gaining hands-on experience and contributing to critical projects across various functions.

 

We are looking for individuals who:

  • Are passionate about the aerospace & defense industry.
  • Have a strong desire to contribute to India's technological advancements.
  • Are eager to learn and grow in a challenging and rewarding environment.

 

As a PGET, you will have the opportunity to:

  • Work on cutting-edge projects and technologies.
  • Gain hands-on experience in various functions.
  • Receive mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.
  • Develop your technical and leadership skills.
  • Build a successful career in the aerospace & defense industry.


As a Structures trainee, you will be,

  • Responsible for preparing structural design both metallic and composite
  • Responsible for system design, system installation design, system testing & certification
  • Handling the aircraft critical components/ mechanical components; Rigging the Flight Controls, Landing Gear systems, etc.
  • Carry out Leak checks and rectification work for Fuel systems, Flight Control Actuators, Engine systems, Propellers
  • Perform linear/ non-linear static analysis, Modal/Dynamic analysis, Fatigue analysis & prepare stress reports/ documents for certification.

 

Technical requisites:

  • Knowledge of aerospace materials - composite & component manufacturing
  • Good knowledge of aircraft systems and design
  • Knowledge of stress – metallic and composite components
  • Good knowledge in loads generation for critical points on the flight envelope for structural design.
  • Knowledge on Flight Control Actuators, Engine systems, Propellers
  • Understanding of DFx studies including DFMEA, DFMA and DFT

 

Other requirements:

  • Knowledge of tools like Nastran Patran, ANSYS, CATIA, Solidworks

job_description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Quantitative Researcher / Developer with strong programming expertise and a deep understanding of financial markets. The ideal candidate should be experienced in developing, testing, and deploying systematic trading strategies using large datasets and advanced statistical/ML techniques.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and optimize algorithmic trading strategies across multiple asset classes.
  • Work with large-scale time series data for cleaning, preprocessing, and efficient storage.
  • Implement quantitative models using statistical methods, machine learning, and stochastic processes.
  • Carry out portfolio research using Backtrader, VectorBT, or similar research frameworks.
  • Conduct extensive backtesting using in-sample, out-of-sample, and walk-forward methodologies.
  • Perform Monte Carlo simulations for robustness and sensitivity analysis.
  • Utilize GPU acceleration (CUDA) and parallel computing (Dask / multiprocess) to scale computations.
  • Work closely with engineering teams to implement strategies into production systems.

Required Skills & Expertise

  • Programming Skills: Python (Pandas, NumPy, SciPy), C++, C#
  • Backtesting Frameworks: Backtrader, VectorBT
  • Data Handling: Large datasets, data cleaning, efficient storage methods
  • Mathematical Skills: Time series, copulas, Kalman filters, statistical modeling, strong linear algebra & probability, financial engineering
  • Machine Learning: Practical implementation of ML algorithms in quantitative workflows
  • Computing Skills: CUDA for GPU acceleration, Dask, multiprocessing, parallel computation
  • Testing & Validation: Walk-forward optimization, in-sample/out-of-sample evaluation, Monte Carlo simulations

Nice to Have

  • Experience with low-latency execution systems
  • Knowledge of cloud computing / distributed architecture
  • Familiarity with market microstructure and high-frequency data
  • Experience deploying live trading systems

job_description:
About Us

We’re a high-energy team working on an aerospace project incubated under Menon & Menon Ltd, driven by a passion for creative aircraft design, efficient engineering, and technological innovation. If you love the process of designing, building, and refining aircraft systems from concept to prototype, this is the place for you.

Menon and Menon Limited is a 70+ year-old organization specializing in the manufacture of cylinder heads and cylinder blocks. With two non-captive foundries in Maharashtra, India, and an in-house machine shop, we offer fully integrated casting and machining capabilities. This has helped us build long-standing partnerships with reputed Indian OEMs such as John Deere, Tata, Mahindra & Mahindra, Ashok Leyland, TAFE, Escorts, and others.

Role Overview

As a Technical Executive, you will take part in the complete aircraft design cycle, from conceptual design to integration and testing. You’ll work on aerodynamics, structural design, performance analysis, aircraft sizing, and system development, with exposure to flight control systems and avionics integration.

Key Responsibilities

  • Participate in the conceptual and preliminary design of fixed-wing aircraft and UAVs.
  • Perform aerodynamic analyses, including airfoil and planform selection, drag estimation, and lift performance.
  • Contribute to weight estimation, sizing, and configuration layout 
  • Support structural design, load path definition, and material selection.
  • Assist in flight control system development, including surface sizing, stability analysis, and control tuning.
  • Work with avionics and flight physics teams on flight instrumentation, simulation models, and system integration.
  • Conduct computational and analytical studies using tools like OpenVSP, XFLR5, Python, or MATLAB.
  • Participate in design reviews, documentation, and report preparation.
  • Collaborate with senior engineers on experimental prototypes and wind tunnel validation.

Desired Skills and Background

  • Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace or Aeronautical Engineering.
  • Strong understanding of aircraft design fundamentals (aerodynamics, performance, controls, propulsion, and structures).
  • Familiar with tools such as CATIA, SolidWorks, Fusion 360, OpenVSP, XFOIL/XFLR5, Abaqus, Ansys, Nastran, MATLAB, or Simulink.
  • Passion for aircraft design and flight analysis.
  • Good understanding of flight dynamics and control systems.
  • Eagerness to learn, innovate, and contribute in a collaborative startup environment.

What We Offer

  • Hands-on involvement in real aircraft projects
  • Mentoring from experienced designers and engineers
  • Working with global consultants to learn new things
  • A creative environment where your ideas shape actual designs.
  • Opportunities to grow into advanced design, systems, prototyping, or test roles.
  • A fun and fast-paced team working to redefine general aviation and UAV performance.
  • Opportunity to understand and learn how various subsystems interact and collaborate to meet the product’s strategic objectives
  • Opportunities for Domestic and International Aviation Exposure
skill_set:
Strong understanding of aircraft design fundamentals (aerodynamics, performance, controls, propulsion, and structures).
Familiar with tools such as CATIA, SolidWorks, Fusion 360, OpenVSP, XFOIL/XFLR5, Abaqus, Ansys, Nastran, MATLAB, or Simulink.
Passion for aircraft design and flight analysis.
Good understanding of flight dynamics and control systems.
Eagerness to learn, innovate, and contribute in a collaborative startup environment.

About Us: SuperAGI is pioneering the future of Artificial General Intelligence with groundbreaking research and innovative AI products. Our mission is to transform the future of applications through intelligent, autonomous solutions that drive unparalleled efficiency and growth. We are building a world where AI and human intelligence collaborate seamlessly to achieve extraordinary outcomes. If you are passionate about AI and eager to be part of a team that is shaping the future, SuperAGI is the place for you. Role Overview : As an AI Researcher at SuperAGI, you will lead and collaborate on advanced research initiatives in generative AI, AGI, and deep learning. You will work on developing novel AI models and algorithms capable of learning in a more generalized way, driving forward our mission to build intelligent agents that can adapt to a wide range of tasks and environments. If you have a passion for pushing the boundaries of AI and want to have a significant impact on the future of AGI, this is the role for you.

Key Responsibilities

● Conduct cutting-edge research in generative AI, with a focus on AGI models, deep reinforcement learning, self-supervised learning, and multimodal systems.

● Design and implement novel algorithms and architectures to enable AI systems to reason, plan, and interact in complex environments.

● Build and optimize generative models, including transformers, GANs, VAEs, and other advanced techniques, for scalable, real-world applications.

● Collaborate with the engineering team to turn research ideas into scalable, production-ready solutions.

● Publish your research in leading conferences and journals (e.g., NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR).

● Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI research, bringing fresh ideas and approaches to the team.

● Contribute to the development of SuperAGI's broader roadmap by working closely with cross-functional teams, including product, engineering, and operations.

job_description:
1)Senior Product Designer -

About the Role

As a Senior Designer at DoubleTick — the flagship enterprise product by Apport Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd. — you will be at the heart of designing user experiences for a powerful WhatsApp-based Customer Relations and Communication platform used by over 7,000 businesses across 140+ countries. DoubleTick helps sales teams streamline lead management, collaborate more effectively, and drive results — all within the Meta ecosystem. In this role, you’ll take complete ownership of the end-to-end design process, from discovering user needs and defining interaction flows to crafting high-fidelity mockups and working closely with developers to ensure flawless implementation. You’ll collaborate with product managers early in the product development cycle, contributing to feature discussions and helping shape the roadmap with your design perspective. Beyond the product team, you’ll work cross-functionally with customer support, customer success, and marketing teams to ensure the design aligns with both user needs and business goals. You'll also have opportunities to directly interact with our high-value customers to understand their workflows, uncover pain points, and validate design decisions that lead to meaningful product improvements.

Key Responsibilities

● Design elegant, user-centered solutions that simplify complex workflows into intuitive experiences, for both web and mobile platforms. ● Own the end-to-end design process — from problem identification and user research to designing a solution. ● Work closely with product managers to define product features, contribute to roadmap discussions, and bring user perspective into early-stage planning. ● Collaborate with engineers to ensure seamless design handoff and faithful implementation of design specifications. ● Conduct usability testing, user interviews, and implement other research methodologies to validate design decisions and improve product experience. ● Maintain and evolve our design system, ensuring consistency across product surfaces while enabling rapid iteration. ● Communicate design decisions clearly and effectively to stakeholders, using mockups, prototypes, and rational storytelling. ● Partner with cross-functional teams including customer support, marketing, and customer success to incorporate feedback and improve usability. ● Interact directly with high-value customers to understand their challenges and incorporate real-world insights into product design.

Required Skills and Qualifications

● Master’s degree in Interaction Design, Product Design, HCI, Communication Design, or a related discipline. ● Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centric design thinking, Mobile/Web app interfaces, and a keen eye for usability and aesthetics. ● Proficiency in Figma, including component libraries, interactive prototypes, and collaborative design workflows. ● Solid understanding of UX principles, human-centered design, Interaction design methodologies and research methodologies. ● Excellent communication and presentation skills — conveying design decisions with clarity and confidence. 

2)Junior Product Designer -

About the Role

As a Junior Product Designer at DoubleTick — the flagship enterprise product by Apport Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd. — you will be at the heart of designing user interfaces for a powerful WhatsApp-based Customer Relations and Communication platform used by over 7,000 businesses across 140+ countries. DoubleTick helps sales teams streamline lead management, collaborate more effectively, and drive results — all within the Meta ecosystem. In this role, you’ll be creating low-fidelity mockups, high-fidelity mockups, and conducting usability testing to ensure your designs are both visually appealing and functional while working closely with senior designers, product managers, and engineers to translate briefs into multiple design options, iterate quickly, and ensure a smooth handoff to development. Beyond the product team, you’ll work cross-functionally with customer support, customer success, and marketing teams to ensure the design aligns with both user needs and business goals

Key Responsibilities

● Design elegant, user-centered solutions that simplify complex workflows into intuitive experiences, for both web and mobile platforms. ● Design interfaces for all of our platforms translating requirements into multiple visual options. ● Work closely with senior designers and engineers to contribute to product feature discussions, and ensure seamless design handoff and faithful implementation of design specifications. ● Conduct usability testing, user interviews, and implement other research methodologies to validate design decisions and improve product experience. ● Maintain our design system, ensuring consistency across product surfaces while enabling rapid iteration. ● Communicate design decisions clearly and effectively to stakeholders, using mockups, prototypes, and rational storytelling. ● Communicate design decisions clearly and effectively to stakeholders, using mockups, prototypes, and rational storytelling.

Required Skills and Qualifications

● Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Interaction Design, Product Design, HCI,Communication Design or a related discipline. ● Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centric design thinking, Mobile/Web app interfaces, and a keen eye for usability and aesthetics. ● Proficiency in Figma, including component libraries, interactive prototypes, and collaborative design workflows. ● Solid understanding of UX principles, human-centered design, Interaction design methodologies and research methodologies. ● Excellent communication and presentation skills — conveying design decisions with clarity and confidence.

job_description:
The Model-Based Developer role involves designing and developing control algorithms for EV powertrain, battery management systems (BMS), Charger, Vehicle control system, ABS and its dynamics using MATLAB/Simulink, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement high-performance, production-ready embedded software solutions.


Key Result Areas:

● Control Algorithm Development: Design and implement model-based control algorithms for EV powertrain, Charger, and Vehicle control systems.

● Model-Based Design (MBD): Develop MATLAB/Simulink/Stateflow models for embedded control applications.

● Auto Code Generation & Optimization: Generate optimized Embedded C code using Embedded Coder for real-time execution.

● Software Integration: Integrated model-based control strategies into vehicle ECU embedded software for production deployment.

● Calibration & Parameter Tuning: Develop models with scalability and control parameters tunability for real-world vehicle applications.

● Compliance & Standards: Ensure AUTOSAR, ISO 26262, and functional safety compliance in software development.

● Documentation & Reviews: Maintain detailed documentation of control models, software architecture, and implementation strategies.

job_description:
Key Responsibilities

  • Design and develop AI systems and solutions
  • Build and deploy machine learning and deep learning models using frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn

  • Collaborate with data scientists to convert prototypes into robust, scalable AI products using MLOps tools (MLflow, Kubeflow, CI/CD pipelines)

  • Build chatbots and agents end-to-end using Azure OpenAI, Copilot Studio + Power Automate, and Bot Framework, including authentication handling and multi-channel configuration (Teams, Outlook, Azure App Services)
  • Design prompts, system instructions in Python, and workflows in Power Automate for various use cases (ticketing agent, helpdesk agent, software installation agent, etc.)

  • Implement Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG): create embeddings, vector indexes using Azure AI Search, and write retrieval/API logic in Python/Flask

  • Develop Python/Flask code and APIs for chatbot features such as file upload handling (images/PDFs), structured JSON output, exception handling, and timeouts

  • Integrate chatbots/agents via API with enterprise tools like ServiceNow (tickets), Azure DevOps (pipeline triggers), Outlook/Teams (calendar & messages) to enable real action-triggering conversations
  • Build user-facing analytics using Power BI and Gradio dashboards to monitor usage, response quality, costs, and feedback

  • Create automated remediations for infrastructure alerts/issues using AWS/Azure AI capabilities (e.g., Bedrock, EventBridge)

  • Continuously test, evaluate, and improve existing and new chatbots/agents
  • Work effectively in collaborative, cross-functional team environments

  • Ensure AI systems are efficient, secure, and reliable across cloud and edge environments

  • Work with multiple teams to embed AI capabilities into existing platforms and services
  • Implement ethical AI practices: bias detection, fairness checks, and responsible AI governance

  • Develop and maintain systems capable of real-time decision-making and prediction

job_description:
Responsibilities, Required Skills & Competencies

Role Overview :

We are looking for an experienced Business Analyst to support our SITA Projects, working closely

with customers, development teams, and stakeholders to understand and refine requirements. The

Business Analyst will play a crucial role in gathering, analysing, and documenting business and

system requirements, ensuring the successful development and delivery of SITA products/solutions

such as Borders (eGates, Kiosks, eVISA Systems, and Declaration Systems) and Airport Operations

and Passengers processing areas.

Key Responsibilities :

Requirement Analysis & Stakeholder Communication

• Work closely with customers and stakeholders to gather, understand, and clarify business

requirements.

• Act as a liaison between customers and the development team, ensuring all requirements

are clearly defined.

• Identify gaps or inconsistencies in customer requirements and recommend solutions.

Backlog Management & Documentation

• Create and maintain a product backlog in Azure DevOps, ensuring all customer

requirements are properly captured.

Conduct refinement sessions with the development team to break down requirements into

user stories.

• Write detailed functional specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

• Ensure all requirements are well-documented for development, testing, and customer

approvals.

Development Support & Quality Assurance

• Review and approve development work to ensure it meets business requirements.

• Work with the QA team to validate requirements during testing phases.

• Ensure that the team is developing the right features aligned with customer expectations.

Process & Workflow Documentation

• Create workflow diagrams, process models, and system flowcharts to illustrate how the

solutions will function.

• Document business processes and technical implementations for future reference.

Customer Engagement & Demos

• Conduct customer demos to showcase features and progress.

• Gather customer feedback and incorporate necessary changes into the backlog.

Participation in RFP Response

• Conduct detailed requirement gathering and analysis in collaboration with stakeholders,

ensuring business needs are accurately captured and translated into functional

specifications aligned with RFP goals.

• Act as a liaison between business and technical teams, facilitating workshops and

clarification sessions to ensure clear understanding of RFP objectives and contribute to

solution design and response readiness.

Required Skills & Qualifications

Essential Skills:

• Experience working with Azure DevOps, JIRA, or similar backlog management tools.

• Ability to create workflow diagrams, process models, and system documentation.

• Strong understanding of software development processes and Agile methodologies.

• Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills.

• Experience in conducting requirement refinement sessions with development teams.

• Ability to review and validate development work against business needs.

• Prior experience in participating RFP responses.

Preferred Skills:

• Knowledge in Airport Operations and Passenger processing.

• Experience in Border Control, Immigration, biometric authentication, passport verification,

and eVisa systems.

• Experience in writing technical implementation documents.

job_description:
About Snapmint:

India’s booming consumer market has over 300 million credit-eligible consumers, yet only 35 million actively use credit cards. At Snapmint, we’re reimagining how credit works—with a product-first approach that puts the consumer experience at the center. Our EMI and Pay Later solutions are designed from the ground up to be intuitive, accessible, and frictionless—enabling millions of Indians to purchase what they need, when they need it, whether it’s fashion, electronics, or daily essentials.

From seamless onboarding to instant approvals and zero-cost EMIs, all our products are engineered to empower users while maintaining transparency and trust. We believe that enduring financial services are built not just on fair terms, but also on products that solve real problems with simplicity and scale. Founded in 2017, Snapmint is now India’s leading online zero-cost EMI provider. With over 10 million consumers served across 2,500 cities—and doubling year on year—our growth is a direct outcome of building a world-class online product that people love and rely on.

Responsibilities:

  • Utilize advanced analytical techniques and tools such as SQL and Python to analyze extensive volumes of customer data, extracting valuable insights and identifying opportunities for enhancement
  • Develop a comprehensive understanding of our data sources, tables, and relationships through collaboration with technology partners and business stakeholders
  • Proficiently merge data from various systems and platforms to facilitate a thorough comprehension of diverse customer journeys
  • Identify significant trends, patterns, and anomalies within data sets, translating these findings into actionable recommendations encompassing user conversions, NPA, growth, etc.
  • Design and develop informative dashboards presenting actionable insights tailored to pertinent stakeholders across digital and e-commerce platforms.
  • Effectively communicate findings and insights, translating complex data into comprehensible documents
  • Leverage the understanding of the e-commerce and digital landscape to support decision-making processes

Skills & Qualification Required :

  • Excellent with advance excel
  • Hands on experience in using SQL / Python
  • B. Tech /B.E. from a premier institute
  • Advanced analytical skills with demonstrated ability to work through the development of complex business solutions
  • Strong communicator, both written and verbal.
