job_description:
Job Title: AI Generalist — House of EdTech 

 Location: Pune / Bengaluru / Kolkata (Hybrid)

Eligibility: B.Tech/M.tech (2025–2026 Batch) from IITs. NITs & Top Engineering institutes

About House of EdTech

About House of EdTech

At House of EdTech (Goenka Kachave LLP), we don’t just educate — we empower students and working professionals to build meaningful, future-ready careers.

Founded by IIT Kharagpur alumni Aditya Goenka and Aditya Kachave, we’ve transformed the careers of over 5 million learners through cutting-edge programs in AI, Finance, Data, Product, and Business.

With ₹300+ crore in annual recurring revenue, a 1,000+ member team, and 10 offices across Pune & Kolkata, we are among India’s fastest-growing EdTech organizations.

Our ecosystem of brands — Be10x, Office Master, AI for Techies, Dr. Finance, Profit Uni, Springpad, and Divine Lane — continues to redefine how India learns, upskills, and grows.

About the AI Generalist Role

This program is a fast-track leadership initiative designed to develop hybrid talent — thinkers, builders, creators, and problem-solvers who use AI + business + content + product + marketing to drive impact.

You will work directly with the Founders and senior leadership (IIT Kharagpur, IIT Delhi, ISB alumni) on high-impact, cross-functional AI-first business projects.

This role is for high-ownership individuals who can think strategically and execute fast.

What You Will Actually Do

As an AI Generalist, you will operate across content, growth, product, marketing, AI workflows, and business strategy — integrating artificial intelligence into every function.

AI & Automation

  • Work hands-on with tools like GPT, Claude, ElevenLabs, Runway, HeyGen, n8n workflows, etc.

  • Build AI-first workflows, automations & scalable processes

  • Turn real business problems into automated solutions

Content & Product

  • Create AI-generated content (scripts, reels, carousels)

  • Build courses and learning products for working professionals

  • Assist founders with content-driven and product-driven AI projects

  • Develop viral educational content viewed by millions

Business & Growth

  • Execute cross-functional projects across Product, Marketing, Tech, Data & Ops

  • Use data and insights to support strategic decisions

  • Optimize marketing campaigns using AI-driven insights

  • Identify and implement scalable processes for efficiency & growth

Leadership & Communication

  • Present clear insights via calls, videos, decks & scripts

  • Take end-to-end ownership of projects

  • Collaborate with diverse teams across multiple brands

What We’re Looking For

Core Traits

  • Think analytically

  • Communicate clearly

  • Use AI tools hands-on daily

  • Create content that educates millions

  • Solve problems with speed & ownership

Core: Great speaking skills + strong tech intuition + AI-savviness + Camera friendly

Eligibility

  • MBA/PGDM (2025–2026 Batch) from IIMs and Top B-Schools

Why Join House of EdTech

  • Work directly with founders & top leadership (IITs & ISB)

  • Lead end-to-end projects from Day 1

  • Build AI-driven processes in India’s fastest-growing EdTech ecosystem

  • Exposure across multiple brands and business units

  • Fast-paced, entrepreneurial culture

  • Accelerated leadership & career growth

  • Create impact at scale — your work will reach millions

Got questions?

Email: Vidhi@houseofedtech.in

job_description:
About the Program – qFly

The qFly Leadership Program is a flagship initiative designed to identify, nurture, and accelerate the growth of high-potential business leaders from top-tier BTech/MBA institutions. Over a structured 3-year journey, selected candidates will undergo cross-functional stints, gain exposure to strategic decision-making, and eventually transition into front-end leadership roles— with a clear path toward CXO and CEO positions.

Key Responsibilities

During the program, associates will:

  • Rotate across critical business functions including Strategy, Sales, Product, Delivery, Finance, R&D, Partnerships and Operations.
  • Work directly with senior leadership on high-impact projects.

  • Lead initiatives in digital transformation, client engagement, and market expansion.

  • Analyze business performance and contribute to growth strategies.

  • Drive innovation and operational excellence across teams.
  • Prepare for P&L ownership and customer-facing leadership roles post-program.

Program Structure

  • Year 1: Functional rotations with mentorship from business heads.

  • Year 2: Strategic assignments and leadership shadowing.
  • Year 3: Ownership of a business vertical or geography.

  • Post-Program: Transition into a senior front-end role (e.g., Business Unit Head, Country Manager).

Eligibility Criteria

  • 70%+ marks across Class X, XII, UG, PG.
  • For MBA - Preferably 2 years pre-MBA relevant experience in Technology or Sales.

  • Strong analytical, leadership, and communication skills.

  • Passion for technology, innovation, and business building.
  • Willingness to relocate and take on diverse challenges.

For any queries contact IIT Kanpur Placement Coordinators.

What We Offer

  • Fast-track career path to CXO roles. (It’s repetitive, so can be deleted)
  • Direct exposure to board-level strategy and decision-making.

  • Mentorship from industry veterans and senior executives.

  • Competitive compensation and performance-linked incentives.

  • A dynamic, entrepreneurial culture with global opportunities.

Compensation

  • 16 lacs per annum CTC ( 0-2yrs of exp)

  • 1 lac per annum for every year of relevant work experience beyond 2 years (25months and above)
  • 6 lacs lumpsum payout after end of 3 years

job_description:
Summary:

 

The Scientist-Modeler will be responsible for constructing and implementing multi-scale models that incorporate biological data across various levels, spanning from the cellular and tissue levels to the organ, patient, and population levels. These models will be specifically tailored to address particular disease areas. The Scientist will utilize these models to run simulations aimed at solving real-time challenges. The ideal candidate for this position will possess a robust foundation in mathematical principles and demonstrate substantial experience in the design and development of multi-scale models, ideally within a biological or medical context. Additionally, proficiency in data analysis, programming, and the ability to work collaboratively within a research team will be considered valuable assets.

 

Responsibilities:

●      Develops mathematical models to analyze dynamical behavior, quantify parameter sensitivities and general behavior or systems studied.

●      Surveys available literature summaries and papers to make reasoned decisions on biological representation.

●      Develops tools, scripts etc. to make workflows more efficient.

●      Summarizes research steps taken and their contribution to project goals.

●      Communicates with the client research team to identify need, strives to understand and define a complex research problem, and break it down into a research flow.

●      Communicates effectively with team members and clients and leads the project in alignment with client expectations.

Qualifications for Scientist-Modeler:

●      Bachelors/Masters/PhD in a Quantitative Discipline such as Mechanical/Chemical/Aerospace Engineering or any other Engineering Major with strong quantitative skills, Mathematics or Physics.

●      Model Development: ODE model building for a given system and proficiency in model simulation using Matlab/SciLab/R/Python

●      System Identification: Parameter estimation and optimization approaches

●      Nonlinear dynamics: Evaluation of multiple steady state solutions for a given system,, Local and global sensitivity analysis

●      Scientific skills: Visualization of mathematical functions, Interpretation of results, Drawing inferences and ability to ask “what-if’ questions

●      Additional technical skills of value: Stochastic simulation approaches, Statistics etc

●      Excellent written and verbal communication skills

●      Ability to work independently and as part of an inter-disciplinary team

●      Ability to meet deadlines and work under pressure

●      Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

●      Interest & curiosity in biology and drug development
package_details:
Base compensation - 13,50,000 - Paid monthly

Performance bonus - 1,01,250 -7.50%

Company bonus - 50,000 - Paid once a year

Total comp = 15,01,250 /-
skill_set: ODE model building, effect diagram construction, mathematical function plotting, quantitative algorithm design and parameter estimation.

job_description:
Data Analyst I

Company Overview

Battery Smart – India’s Largest Battery Swapping Network for Electric Vehicles

Established in 2019, Battery Smart is on a mission to make electric mobility accessible and affordable for all. Since launching our first station in June 2020, we have rapidly scaled to become India’s largest battery-swapping network for electric two- and three-wheelers. Today, we power the journeys of over 80,000+ drivers every day through 1,600+ stations across 55+ cities. With a total of 2,50,000+ batteries and 90 million+ swaps completed, Battery Smart has become a cornerstone of India’s EV ecosystem.

Led by Co-founders Pulkit Khurana and Siddharth Sikka (both IIT Kanpur alumni), we are reshaping the future of sustainable transportation in India.

Role Overview

You will play a critical role in transforming large-scale operational and IoT data into actionable insights that optimize battery performance, enhance network efficiency, and elevate customer experience. You will work cross-functionally with teams across Product, Operations, and Engineering to drive data-informed decision-making across Battery Smart’s fast-growing EV ecosystem.


Key Responsibilities

  • Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and improvement opportunities in operations and performance.
  • Design, develop, and validate predictive models (forecasting, clustering, classification) to support business initiatives.
  • Build and automate dashboards and reports to track KPIs and provide actionable insights for leadership.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business challenges into data-driven solutions.
  • Leverage AI/ML and geospatial analytics to drive optimization and innovation across the network.
  • Contribute to the development of scalable data pipelines and analytics workflows.

Skills We Value

  • Proficiency in SQL & Python (Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, PyTorch/TensorFlow a plus)
  • Understanding of machine learning and statistical analysis
  • Understanding of business strategy, market research, and operational workflows
  • Ability to work with large, messy, real-world datasets
  • Interest in cloud platforms (Databricks, AWS/GCP) and data pipelines
  • Strong problem-solving mindset and communication skills.

Why Join Battery Smart?

  • Impactful Work: Drive the data backbone of India’s largest EV battery-swapping network.
  • Cross-Functional Exposure: Collaborate with Product, Operations, and Engineering to solve complex business problems.
  • Innovation-Driven Culture: Be part of a fast-paced environment where ideas lead to immediate action.
  • Growth & Learning: Continuous upskilling opportunities and a clear growth path within the analytics and data science domain.
  • Sustainability & Purpose: Contribute to shaping India’s electric mobility revolution.

Company Overview

Battery Smart - India’s Largest Battery Swapping Network for Electric Vehicles

Established in 2019, Battery Smart on a mission to make electric mobility accessible and affordable for all. Since its first station launch in June 2020, the company scaled rapidly to become India’s largest battery-swapping network for electric two and three-wheelers. Today, it powers the journeys of over 80K drivers every day through 1,600+ stations across 55+ cities in the country. With a total of 250,000 batteries and more than 90 million swaps completed, Battery Smart has established itself as a cornerstone of India’s EV ecosystem.

Led by our Co-founders, Pulkit Khurana and Siddharth Sikka (both IIT Kanpur alumni) are at the forefront of reshaping the future of sustainable transportation in India.

 

Role Overview

You will play a key role in driving strategic initiatives and improving operational efficiency across Battery Smart’s rapidly expanding EV ecosystem. You will leverage data-driven insights to shape business decisions, streamline processes, and support leadership in solving complex business challenges. This role is ideal for professionals who thrive in fast-paced, analytical, and cross-functional environments.

 

What You’ll Work On

  1. Analyze large and complex datasets to identify business trends, opportunities, and risks.
  2. Drive strategic projects focused on growth, operational efficiency, and process optimization.
  3. Build and test forecasting and performance models to guide business decisions.
  4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Product, Operations, and Finance to translate insights into actionable strategies.
  5. Track and report key performance metrics through automated dashboards and regular business reviews.
  6. Conduct market research and competitive analysis to support strategic planning and expansion.

Skills We Value

  • Proficiency in SQL & Python (Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, PyTorch/TensorFlow a plus)
  • Understanding of machine learning and statistical analysis
  • Understanding of business strategy, market research, and operational workflows
  • Ability to work with large, messy, real-world database.
  • Interest in cloud platforms (Databricks, AWS/GCP) and data pipelines.
  • Strong problem-solving mindset and communication skills

Why Join Us?

High-Impact Work: Contribute directly to shaping strategic initiatives in India’s fast-growing EV sector.

Cross-Functional Exposure: Collaborate with senior leaders and teams across Product, Operations, and Strategy.

Growth Opportunities: Experience steep learning curves and accelerated career development in a dynamic startup.

job_description:
Role: PRISM is excited to welcome fresh graduates to its flagship Young Leaders Program, designed to shape

the future leaders of its business. As Graduate Business

Trainees, participants will undergo comprehensive

training across key functions such as revenue, supply,

customer experience, and product development. Upon

completion, trainees will assume leadership roles within

one of these critical areas to drive PRISM's business

growth.

Responsibilities :

 Contribute to the development and implementation of strategic initiatives that drive business

growth and innovation.

 Optimize operational processes and drive efficiency across various functions.

 Leverage data analytics to make informed decisions and identify growth opportunities.

 Work closely with teams across different departments to foster a collaborative and innovative

work environment.

 Make PRISM a data driven organization by creating platforms to better access, interpret and use data

in driving day-to-day decisions and business functioning.

 Identify and analyze complex problems, developing creative and effective solutions.

 Assist in making key data-related decisions by extracting, analyzing, manipulating, tracking, internally

managing and reporting data, as well as Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) by working with cross-

functional teams.

 Partner with business leaders to answer key business questions.

 Generate insights for other business and product teams by providing them understandable and

actionable reports from data.

Basic Qualifications :

 We are seeking candidates with a strong analytical mindset, exceptional communication skills, and

demonstrated leadership experience during their academic journey. This role plays a pivotal part in

delivering innovative solutions and achieving strategic objectives while enhancing operational efficiency.

 Demonstrated leadership attributes in previous projects / internship

 Should be able to prioritize in fast-moving complex environment and produce solutions despite complex

requirements.

 Should have excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Good to have :

 Ability to work in high pressure environment.

Barclays Overview

Barclays is a British universal bank. We are diversified by business, by different types of customers and clients, and by geography. Our businesses include consumer banking and payments operations around the world, as well as a top-tier, full service, global corporate and investment bank, all of which are supported by our service company which provides technology, operations, and functional services across the Group.


We are an equal opportunity employer, and we are opposed to discrimination on any grounds.


It is the policy of Barclays to ensure equal employment opportunity without discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic/civil partnership status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by law.

Dynamic working gives everyone at Barclays the opportunity to integrate professional and personal lives, if you have a need for flexibility then please discuss this with the hiring manager.


About Quantitative Analytics

Quantitative Analytics (QA) is a global organisation of highly specialized quantitative modellers and developers. QA is led by Olaf Springer, who is a member of Risk Exco.

QA is responsible for developing, testing, implementing, and supporting quantitative models for valuation and risk management of traded assets, regulatory and economic capital, impairments, asset-liability management, operational risk, net revenue and balance sheet forecasting, and stress testing across Barclays.

About QA Model Monitoring

QA Model Monitoring acts as one of the primary ways to mitigate Model Risk by highlighting areas of sub-optimal performance and by proposing effective remediation plan for models in use by business. Model Risk is the potential of adverse consequences (e.g. financial loss, reputational impact, regulatory censure etc.) due to decisions based on incorrect or misused model outputs and reports. This can arise from fundamental model weaknesses leading to inaccurate outputs, errors in implementation, or incorrect/inappropriate use. Monitoring team periodically evaluates model performance. Monitoring findings help business decide upon the further uses of the model to continue, adjust, or discontinue and rebuild the model.

Overall purpose of role


  • Performance monitoring and analysis of Decision, Planning & Stress Testing, Impairment and Regulatory Capital models etc. across Retail and Wholesale banking portfolios including Wholesale, Mortgage, Cards, Loans, SME, Corporate Lending etc.
  • Documentation of monitoring reports as per the standard guidelines and presenting the same to senior management and various decision-making committees
  • Drive and provide support in the Model Management decision making, model improvements and governance activities


Key Accountabilities


  • Understand construct of various credit risk models and produce timely and accurate model monitoring packs 
  • Interpret various model performance KPIs, metrics and trends, and analyse the impact they have on related portfolios and model use
  • Discuss the model performance with the portfolio teams, and present the outcome in various decision-making committees to assist in the decision making process
  • Standardize & automate the monitoring packs using appropriate software and statistical programming languages e.g. Excel, SQL, R, SAS, Python etc.
  • Drive and provide support in the monitoring governance activities like writing minutes of meetings, follow up to close action items etc.


Person Specification

  • Excellent analytical, technical and/or statistical skills 
  • Understanding of model performance monitoring/ Back-testing methodologies and portfolio MIS understanding of banking products and lending procedures
  • Knowledge of credit risk models and their usage in the Banking environment
  • Knowledge of various statistical techniques used in analytics (regression, time series, cluster analysis, machine learning algorithms etc.)
  • Good at carrying out statistical analysis using appropriate software and statistical programming languages e.g. Excel, SQL, R, SAS, Python etc.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to articulate complex analytical problems and solutions at various levels
  • Self-starter who can take initiative to automate the monitoring activity to the maximum level



  • Preferred

  • Knowledge of models and portfolio dynamics, impairment calculation
  • Understanding of lending products from policy and P&L perspective
  • A background in credit risk within a banking/consulting firm


Education

  • Masters in Engineering/Technology.

Experience

  • Strong analytical background, data driven, results orientated

Stakeholder Management and Leadership 

Engage with stakeholders, partners and business heads across global locations to execute projects in line with business expectation 

Decision-making and Problem Solving 


  • Provide recommendations based on model monitoring findings in terms of model issues, need for rebuild / calibration, or PMA
  • Perform additional deep dive and ad hoc analysis to support monitoring outcome and decision making


Risk and Control Objective 

All Barclays colleagues have to ensure that all activities and duties are carried out in full compliance with regulatory requirements, Enterprise-Wide Risk Management Framework and internal Barclays Policies and Policy Standards


About Barclays India Employee Value Proposition

People are central to the success of any organisation and it is no different at Barclays. It has been our constant endeavour to invest in and create an environment and culture where colleagues feel valued, are able to explore their potential and have opportunities to grow.

Our Employee Value proposition is all about Being more – as a professional, as a person. It is about being:


  • More Globally Connected
  • More Inspired
  • More Impactful
  • More Valued

Also do find the link below

https://www.barclays.in/people-and-culture/working-at-barclays/

job_description:
About Us

ICICI Lombard: Shape the Future Us

Since 2001, ICICI Lombard has grown into India’s leading private general insurer, trusted by

millions of customers and powered by 15,000+ employees across 328 branches. At the heart of

our success is our One IL 1 Team ethos, where behaviours like Growth Mindset, Teamwork, and

Adaptability unite us to achieve more together.

We are reimagining insurance with technology and innovation — from AI-driven claim settlements to

digital-first customer experiences and data-led solutions that transform the way we serve. Every

employee is empowered to innovate, contribute ideas, and create impact beyond their roles.

Our culture is built on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI). With 26% women in our workforce,

generational diversity, and inclusion workshops across India, we ensure equal access to

opportunities, resources, and leadership pathways.

We also take pride in giving back through CSR programs like Caring Hands, Ride to Safety, and

Niranjali, which have touched millions of lives and earned global recognition, including two

Guinness World Records.

Recognised as a Great Place to Work six times, featured among the Best Companies for Women in

India, and globally honoured with ATD Best Awards for 13 years, ICICI Lombard is where you can

grow, innovate, and make a difference.

Join us — together, we succeed as One IL 1 Team.

Role & Responsibilities

 Model Development: Design, build, and optimize advanced statistical and machine learning models to

solve complex business problems.

 LLM & Generative AI: Research and implement innovative LLM/GenAI solutions, including advanced

prompt engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks, and parameter-efficient

fine-tuning for specific business needs. Develop and optimize LLM-based conversation flows and agent

architectures.

 Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with product, engineering, and business stakeholders to

translate complex challenges into actionable data science solutions and communicate findings

effectively to technical and non-technical audiences.

 Infrastructure & Deployment: Work with data engineering teams to design scalable data models and

robust, automated ML pipelines using MLOps best practices and cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Manage integrations with internal and external systems (APIs, data stacks, cloud tools)

 Performance Monitoring: Implement monitoring frameworks to track and enhance the performance

of deployed models.

 Contribute to continuous R&D: new models, embeddings, prompt engineering, evaluation frameworks

 Foundation of Core: Strong foundation in supervised & unsupervised ML algorithms, evaluation

metrics, and feature engineering. Practical experience with hands-on modelling and experimentation.

Education / Additional Requirements

 Bachelor’s/Master's degree in computer science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics

 Strong analytical thinking and structured problem-solving ability.

 Excellent interpersonal communication and stakeholder engagement.

 Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and lead through influence.

 High ownership and drive to deliver measurable impact.

 Proficiency in Python, R, and SQL for model development and data analytics.

 Research/Academic thesis involving application of AI/ML frameworks would be plus.

ICICI Lombard: Shape the Future Us

Since 2001, ICICI Lombard has grown into India’s leading private general insurer, trusted by

millions of customers and powered by 15,000+ employees across 328 branches. At the heart of

our success is our One IL 1 Team ethos, where behaviours like Growth Mindset, Teamwork,

and Adaptability unite us to achieve more together.

We are reimagining insurance with technology and innovation - from AI-driven claim

settlements to digital-first customer experiences and data-led solutions that transform the way

we serve. Every employee is empowered to innovate, contribute ideas, and create impact

beyond their roles.

Our culture is built on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI). With 26% women in our

workforce, generational diversity, and inclusion workshops across India, we ensure equal access

to opportunities, resources, and leadership pathways.

We also take pride in giving back through CSR programs like Caring Hands, Ride to Safety,

and Niranjali, which have touched millions of lives and earned global recognition, including

two Guinness World Records.

Recognised as a Great Place to Work six times, featured among the Best Companies for Women

in India, and globally honoured with ATD Best Awards for 13 years, ICICI Lombard is where

you can grow, innovate, and make a difference.

Join us - together, we succeed as One IL 1 Team.

General Description of the Job

Job Description: We are looking for a dynamic and experienced individual to join our team as

Senior Manager - Innovation & Strategy at ICICI Lombard General Insurance. In this role, you

will be at the forefront of driving technological advancement and fostering innovation across the

insurance landscape. As a Senior Manager, you will play a pivotal role in shaping, leading, and

executing strategic initiatives, with a strong focus on leveraging cutting-edge technologies to

design and develop next-generation insurtech solutions.

Role & Responsibilities

1.Technology Innovation: Lead the development and implementation of AI and ML solutions to enhance multiple

facets of insurance operations, including underwriting, risk assessment, and claims

management.

 Drive the adoption of Python-based development to build innovative tools, automation

frameworks, and analytical applications.

 Spearhead the integration of advanced technologies-such as IoT, GIS, satellite imaging,

and location-based data into core insurance processes to generate actionable insights for

risk assessment and claims processing.

 Evaluate, optimize, and refine existing processes and systems to ensure alignment with

industry best practices and to improve operational efficiency.

2. Collaboration with External Ecosystem:

 Partner with external solution providers and technology partners to identify, evaluate,

and integrate third-party technologies that support and align with organizational strategic

goals.

3. Strategic Planning:

 Work closely with senior leadership to develop and execute data-driven business

strategies, ensuring alignment with overall business objectives and long-term vision.

4. Cross-Functional Collaboration:

Collaborate with multiple internal teams, including IT, Data Science, and Operations, to ensure

the seamless integration and adoption of technological solutions across the organization

Education / Additional Requirements

Skills Required:

 Expertise in developing and deploying Machine Learning models.

 Strong strategic thinking and analytical capabilities.

 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

 Proven ability to lead, guide, and motivate cross-functional teams.

 Ability to thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environments, with a strong focus on process

and data-driven decision-making.

 Innovative mindset with a passion for staying updated with emerging technologies.

 Experience in Full Stack Development and App Development will be an added

advantage

 B.Tech, BS, M.Tech, and M.Sc across all disciplines.

If you are passionate about driving innovation in the insurance industry and have a proven track

record in implementing transformative technologies, we encourage you to apply.

job_description:
Description

Trexquant is a systematic hedge fund that uses thousands of statistical algorithms to trade equity and futures markets globally. Starting with numerous data sets, we develop a wide range of features and apply various machine learning methods to discover trading signals and combine them into market-neutral portfolios.

We are looking for scientists, engineers, economists, and programmers to develop the next generation of machine learning strategies that accurately predict the future movements of liquid financial assets.

Responsibilities

  • Design, implement, and optimize machine learning models aimed at predicting liquid assets using diverse financial data and a vast library of trading signals
  • Parse data sets for alpha (strategy) development
  • Investigate and implement state-of-the-art academic research in quantitative finance
  • Collaborate with experienced quantitative researchers to conduct experiments and test hypotheses using simulations

Requirements

  • Passion for machine learning and quantitative finance
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and in a team
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python
  • Prior experience in alpha research and development of trading signals/strategies is preferred

Benefits

  • Competitive compensation with bonus tied to the performance of algorithms you develop
  • Collaborative and friendly work environment
  • Participation in research direction decision-making
  • Opportunity to lead new ideas
  • Trexquant is an Equal Opportunity Employer
perks:
Health insurance for employees and family
Free fitness (gym and sports) membership
Annual technical reimbursement
Annual education reimbursement
Weekly meals in the office

Role Overview

As a Configware Engineer, you will work on FPGA-based systems and digital design projects. This role involves learning and assisting in hardware description languages, FPGA toolchains, and basic interface protocols.

________________________________________

Core Design Languages

• VHDL

• Verilog

• System C

________________________________________

Target Platforms

• Xilinx FPGA

• Intel FPGA

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

• FPGA configuration and synthesis using Xilinx Vivado or Intel Quartus.

• RTL coding in VHDL or Verilog for FPGA modules.

• Simulation and functional verification of designs.

• Work on communication protocols (I2C, SPI, UART) for peripheral interfacing.

• Maintain documentation and version control for design changes.

• Collaborate effectively within the team to support integration, testing and overall design activities.

________________________________________

Skills Required

Must-Have:

• Strong understanding of digital design fundamentals.

• Knowledge of VHDL/Verilog and FPGA architecture.

• Solid Understanding of timing constraints (setup/hold, CDS).

Good-to-Have:

• Exposure to AXI interface, DDR controllers.

• Basic scripting (Python/TCL) for automation.

• Awareness of Linux environment and embedded concepts.

________________________________________

Tools & Technologies

• FPGA tools: Xilinx Vivado, Intel Quartus (basic usage).

• Simulation tools: ModelSim, Vivado Simulator.

• Familiar with version control systems (e.g. Git) for collaborative development and code management.

________________________________________

Educational Qualification

• B.E/B. Tech in Electronics, Electrical, or related field.

________________________________________

job_description:
Job Description – Mechanical Engineer – R&D Mechanical 

This position is for the development of controls for the UAV and its payloads. Control Systems Engineer will create world-class control solutions which will enable UAV and its subsystems to address the complex and critical operational challenges that the customers face.

Joiner will get exposure to working on world-class technologies in

  • Develop practical and innovative mechanical designs.
  • Tightly integrated, high reliability electro-mechanical intelligent systems.
  • Experience in designing mechanical /robotic systems using very strong technical fundamentals. 
  • Knowledge of Strength of Materials, Structural Analysis, Vibrations, and isolation strategies. 
  • Rugged, all-weather, portable electro-mechanical system design
  • High precision multi-actuator control mechanisms
  • High density portable electronics enclosure design.
  • Small aero structures, high-performance plastics, composite materials.
  • Key Skills - Strength of Materials, Structural Analysis, Vibrations, and isolation strategies, Mechatronics with the ability to do system-level design and optimization




Join Our Team: Building the Future of UAV/UAS Technologies


  • For the third consecutive year, we are excited to visit your campus, continuing our tradition of recruiting talented minds who are eager to innovate in the field of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) and Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS). Our organization, founded by IIT Bombay alumni and nurtured within IITB labs, is at the forefront of developing cutting-edge technologies that are transforming the UAV/UAS landscape.

 

  • About Us:
  • At IdeaForge, we specialize in creating world-class software and firmware solutions for UAV/UAS systems and their ecosystems. Our work is driven by innovation and excellence, and we take pride in pushing the boundaries of technology.

 

Job Description: Control Systems Engineer - UAV and Payload Development


  • We are seeking a highly skilled Control Systems Engineer to join our team in developing advanced control systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) and their associated payloads. In this role, you will be instrumental in crafting innovative control solutions that empower UAVs and their subsystems to tackle complex, mission-critical challenges faced by our clients.


  • Key Responsibilities:
  • Design and Development: Conceptualize and develop cutting-edge mechanical designs, pushing the boundaries of practical and innovative engineering.
  • Electro-Mechanical Integration: Engineer tightly integrated, high-reliability electro-mechanical systems with intelligent control capabilities.
  • Robotics and Mechanical Systems: Apply strong technical fundamentals to design sophisticated mechanical and robotic systems, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
  • Structural and Material Expertise: Utilize deep knowledge in Strength of Materials, Structural Analysis, Vibrations, and isolation strategies to inform design decisions.
  • Rugged Design: Develop robust, all-weather, portable electro-mechanical systems designed to withstand harsh environmental conditions.
  • Precision Mechanisms: Design and implement high-precision, multi-actuator control mechanisms for critical applications.
  • Compact Electronics Enclosures: Innovate in the design of high-density, portable electronics enclosures that meet stringent performance and durability requirements.
  • Advanced Materials: Work with small aero structures, high-performance plastics, and composite materials to create state-of-the-art systems.

  • Required Skills and Expertise:
  • Strength of Materials: Proficiency in analyzing and applying material strength in various design contexts.
  • Structural Analysis: Expertise in conducting and interpreting structural analysis for mechanical systems.
  • Vibration and Isolation: Advanced understanding of vibration analysis and isolation strategies for mechanical and electro-mechanical systems.
  • Mechatronics: Strong capability in mechatronics, with a focus on system-level design, integration, and optimization.
  • This position offers a unique opportunity to work with world-class technologies, driving innovation in the UAV industry while solving some of the most pressing operational challenges in the field.

  • Why Join Us?
  • - Work on innovative technologies that define the future of UAV/UAS.
  • - Collaborate with industry experts and pioneers in the field.
  • - Contribute to projects with real-world impact.

  • Connect with Us:
  • Website:[https://ideaforgetech.com/aboutus]
  • LinkedIn:[https://www.linkedin.com/company/ideaforge/posts/?feedView=all]

 

  • Join us in shaping the future of UAV/UAS technology!

Job Description – Engineer – R&D Electronics

This position is for the development of electronics for the UAV/UAS systems and their ecosystems.

The new hire will get exposure to working on world-class technologies in

  • Autopilot System and computer modules.
  • Battery Management Systems and Battery Packs.
  • Brushless Motors, associated Drives, and various motor control algorithms.
  • Wireless Communication Systems.
  • GNSS systems and associated technologies like PPK/RTK.
  • Smart Charging Systems for batteries.
  • Payloads and Opto-Electronic Systems. 
  • Programming Languages: C, Embedded C firmware programming


Job Description: Electronics Engineer

We are seeking a talented Electronics Engineer, preferably an IIT graduate, to join our team in developing cutting-edge electronics for UAV/UAS systems and their supporting ecosystems. This role offers the opportunity to work with world-class technologies in a dynamic and innovative environment.


Key Responsibilities:

As an Electronics Engineer, you will gain hands-on experience and contribute to the following areas:


  • Autopilot Systems & Computer Modules: Design and develop advanced autopilot systems and computer modules for UAVs.
  • Battery Management Systems & Battery Packs: Work on the development and optimization of efficient battery management systems and high-performance battery packs.
  • Brushless Motors & Motor Control: Design and implement control algorithms for brushless motors and their associated drives.
  • Wireless Communication Systems: Develop and integrate reliable wireless communication systems for UAVs.
  • GNSS Systems & Associated Technologies: Work with GNSS technologies, including PPK/RTK, to enhance navigation and positioning accuracy.
  • Smart Charging Systems: Develop smart charging solutions for batteries, ensuring efficient and safe energy management.
  • Payloads & Opto-Electronic Systems: Design and integrate advanced payloads and opto-electronic systems for UAVs.
  • Firmware Development: Utilize programming languages like C and Embedded C to develop firmware for UAV electronics.


Qualifications:

- Graduate from IIT with a focus on Electronics Engineering or a related discipline.

- Strong foundation in electronics design and development.

- Proficiency in C and Embedded C firmware programming.

- Hands-on experience or strong interest in UAV systems is a plus.


This position offers the opportunity to work on the forefront of UAV technology and contribute to the development of next-generation aerial systems.

We are looking for highly analytical and innovative individuals to join our Data Science & AI Team.

This role offers hands-on experience across data analytics, product intelligence, AI prompt engineering, and model evaluation, allowing you to contribute directly to AI-driven product features and engineering decisions.

You will work closely with Data Scientists, Engineers, and Product Teams on high-impact analytical and AI projects.

Key Responsibilities

Data & Business Analytics

  • Clean, structure, and analyze datasets using SQL/Python.
  • Conduct data analytics to uncover trends and generate actionable insights.
  • Define and monitor core business metrics, KPIs, and product analytics.
  • AI/ML Research & Evaluation
  • Write, refine, and test prompts for internal AI systems and tools.
  • Validate business logic and analyze AI/ML model outputs for accuracy.
  • Support Data Scientists with dataset preparation, feature exploration, and model evaluation.
  • Research LLMs, GenAI tools, and emerging AI/ML techniques for new use cases.

Cross-Functional Collaboration

  • Translate complex data findings into clear recommendations for Product & Engineering teams.
  • Assist in experimentation, A/B testing, model comparison, and insights documentation.
  • Present analyses and dashboards to stakeholders in a concise, data-backed manner.

role: Core Engineering & Technology, IT / Software, Data Science/ AI/ ML
job_description:
Who we are

Samsara (NYSE: IOT) is the pioneer of the Connected Operations™ Cloud, which is a platform that enables organizations that depend on physical operations to harness Internet of Things (IoT) data to develop actionable insights and improve their operations. At Samsara, we are helping improve the safety, efficiency and sustainability of the physical operations that power our global economy. Representing more than 40% of global GDP, these industries are the infrastructure of our planet, including agriculture, construction, field services, transportation, and manufacturing — and we are excited to help digitally transform their operations at scale.


Working at Samsara means you’ll help define the future of physical operations and be on a team that’s shaping an exciting array of product solutions, including Video-Based Safety, Vehicle Telematics, Apps and Driver Workflows, Equipment Monitoring, and Site Visibility. As part of a recently public company, you’ll have the autonomy and support to make an impact as we build for the long term. 


Recent awards we’ve won include:


Great Place To Work Certified™ 2023

Best Place to Work by Built In 2023

Financial Times The Americas’ Fastest Growing Companies 2023

Deloitte Fast 500 Companies

IoT Analytics Company of the Year in 2022’s IoT Breakthrough Winners


We see a profound opportunity for data to improve the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of operations, and hope you consider joining us on this exciting journey. 


About the role:

Samsara Technologies India Private Limited is looking for talented engineers to join our infrastructure, full-stack, and mobile infrastructure team in Bengaluru, Karnataka!

As a Software Engineer at Samsara, you will design and develop features across a broad surface area with a tangible impact on active and future customers. You’ll tackle engineering challenges ranging from architecting data structures for mass data collection to presenting data analytics in intuitive and performant ways on web and mobile.


This role is Hybrid - 3 days per week in the office.


You should apply if:


  • You want to impact the industries that run our world: The software, firmware, and hardware you build will result in real-world impact—helping to keep the lights on, get food into grocery stores, and most importantly, ensure workers return home safely.
  • You want to build for scale: With over 2.3 million IoT devices deployed to our global customers, you will work on a range of new and mature technologies driving scalable innovation for customers across industries driving the world's physical operations.
  • You are a life-long learner: We have ambitious goals. Every Samsarian has a growth mindset as we work with a wide range of technologies, challenges, and customers that push us to learn on the go.
  • You believe customers are more than a number: Samsara engineers enjoy a rare closeness to the end user and you will have the opportunity to participate in customer interviews, collaborate with customer success and product managers, and use metrics to ensure our work is translating into better customer outcomes.
  • You are a team player: Working on our Samsara Engineering teams requires a mix of independent effort and collaboration. Motivated by our mission, we’re all racing toward our connected operations vision, and we intend to win—together.

 

In this role, you will: 


  1. Cloud Infra Engineers design and develop the infrastructure that powers Samsara’s IoT platform, used by tens of thousands of customers globally connecting more than 15,000 hardware assets to improve the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of their operations. You will work on scaling our data ingestion and storage systems to support more and more connected devices and work with engineers throughout the company to make new types of data analysis possible.
  2. Full Stack Engineers develop user interfaces that present the data collected from millions of devices in intuitive ways. You will work directly with the design and product teams to identify solutions and iterate quickly based on feedback. The features you build will provide actionable insights for our customers’ operations, and may involve anything from design systems to performance engineering + design and develop features across a broad surface area with tangible impact on active and future customers. You will tackle engineering challenges ranging from architecting data structures for mass data collection to presenting data analytics in intuitive and performant ways on web and mobile.

Minimum requirements for the role:

  • You will complete a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field before July 2026


An ideal candidate also has:

  • Wants to win as a Team! Will champion, role model, and embed Samsara’s values (Focus on Customer Success, Build for the Long Term, Adopt a Growth Mindset, Be Inclusive, Win as a Team) as we scale globally and across new offices.
  • Has a builder mindset! we want to see that you have built or worked on production applications on your resume. We want students with multiple repositories in their GitHub demonstrating your software development journey.

Is customer obsessed! Finds excitement understanding our customers and what would make their day-to-day processes easier. Motivation comes from building and shipping customer experiences and seeks to iterate on new products based on customer feedback.

About us

Founded in 2009 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Nutanix is a passionate team of 6000+ employees worldwide. Our people (we call ourselves "Nutants") are the heartbeat of #LifeAtNutanix and one of the many things that make Nutanix a great place to work at. We share an intellectual curiosity, a bias for action, and an obsession with our customers. We are builders and problem solvers with an entrepreneurial spirit. Above all, we celebrate what makes each of us unique. We are humbled to be named #5 of the Top 100 Software Companies of 2022 by The Software Report and one of the Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For® 2020. We're growing fast and disrupting the computing industry. Join us and make your mark.

About our business — The Story of Nutanix

Nutanix is a global leader in cloud software and a pioneer in hyperconverged infrastructure solutions, making computing invisible anywhere. Companies worldwide use Nutanix software to leverage a single platform to manage any app, at any location, at any scale for their private, hybrid, and multi-cloud environments.

The Software Engineering Team

Nutanix engineers are creating revolutionary technology: building the software-defined datacenter. We're using our love of programming and outstanding backgrounds to change the way companies virtualize their data centers. At Nutanix, you'll find no shortage of challenging problems to work on. We work closely with our product in a collegiate, collaborative environment that encourages the open exploration of ideas. We are looking for smart people who can learn and contribute to our space of cutting-edge innovation irrespective of background. Come make an impact!

http://nutanixbible.com — provides in-depth technical information about the Nutanix platform architecture and a better understanding of why we require interns with a system-centric programming background.

Responsibilities:

  • Design & develop a world-class network hybrid/multi-cloud product that is distributed, resilient, and highly performant at large-scale deployments.
  • Contribute to all phases of product development through conception, design, implementation, and deployment along with performance engineering.

  • Develop robust designs, write code & unit tests to produce high-quality, reusable, and extensible software through an API-driven approach.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Developers, Testers, Product Management, and Support to meet customer requirements while driving engineering innovation.
  • Participate in defining product requirements, review designs and code of other engineers, and review test plans, performance, and scalability plans.

  • Take ownership of product features and work independently with minimal supervision to design & deliver module-level functionality.

Qualifications:

  • B.Tech or M.Tech in Computer Science or equivalent
  • 0 years of software development experience

  • Strong command over languages such as C/C++/Java/Golang, especially in advanced memory management and multi-threaded techniques (huge plus)

  • Strong fundamentals in Operating Systems, Distributed Systems / Databases, File Systems, Multi-threaded/Multi-Process applications, Inter-Process Communication
  • Familiarity with Linux Kernel Internals & Open Source (added advantage)

  • Strong fundamentals in Object-Oriented Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, and Problem Solving

  • Knowledge of networking/virtualization/cloud is a huge plus

job_description:
Who we are

Samsara (NYSE: IOT) is the pioneer of the Connected Operations™ Cloud, which is a platform that enables organizations that depend on physical operations to harness Internet of Things (IoT) data to develop actionable insights and improve their operations. At Samsara, we are helping improve the safety, efficiency and sustainability of the physical operations that power our global economy. Representing more than 40% of global GDP, these industries are the infrastructure of our planet, including agriculture, construction, field services, transportation, and manufacturing — and we are excited to help digitally transform their operations at scale.


Working at Samsara means you’ll help define the future of physical operations and be on a team that’s shaping an exciting array of product solutions, including Video-Based Safety, Vehicle Telematics, Apps and Driver Workflows, Equipment Monitoring, and Site Visibility. As part of a recently public company, you’ll have the autonomy and support to make an impact as we build for the long term. 


Recent awards we’ve won include:


Great Place To Work Certified™ 2023

Best Place to Work by Built In 2023

Financial Times The Americas’ Fastest Growing Companies 2023

Deloitte Fast 500 Companies

IoT Analytics Company of the Year in 2022’s IoT Breakthrough Winners


We see a profound opportunity for data to improve the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of operations, and hope you consider joining us on this exciting journey. 


About the role:

Samsara Technologies India Private Limited is looking for talented engineers to join our infrastructure, full-stack, and mobile infrastructure team in Bengaluru, Karnataka!

As a Software Engineer at Samsara, you will design and develop features across a broad surface area with a tangible impact on active and future customers. You’ll tackle engineering challenges ranging from architecting data structures for mass data collection to presenting data analytics in intuitive and performant ways on web and mobile.


This role is Hybrid - 3 days per week in the office.


You should apply if:


  • You want to impact the industries that run our world: The software, firmware, and hardware you build will result in real-world impact—helping to keep the lights on, get food into grocery stores, and most importantly, ensure workers return home safely.
  • You want to build for scale: With over 2.3 million IoT devices deployed to our global customers, you will work on a range of new and mature technologies driving scalable innovation for customers across industries driving the world's physical operations.
  • You are a life-long learner: We have ambitious goals. Every Samsarian has a growth mindset as we work with a wide range of technologies, challenges, and customers that push us to learn on the go.
  • You believe customers are more than a number: Samsara engineers enjoy a rare closeness to the end user and you will have the opportunity to participate in customer interviews, collaborate with customer success and product managers, and use metrics to ensure our work is translating into better customer outcomes.
  • You are a team player: Working on our Samsara Engineering teams requires a mix of independent effort and collaboration. Motivated by our mission, we’re all racing toward our connected operations vision, and we intend to win—together.

 

In this role, you will: 


  1. Cloud Infra Engineers design and develop the infrastructure that powers Samsara’s IoT platform, used by tens of thousands of customers globally connecting more than 15,000 hardware assets to improve the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of their operations. You will work on scaling our data ingestion and storage systems to support more and more connected devices and work with engineers throughout the company to make new types of data analysis possible.
  2. Full Stack Engineers develop user interfaces that present the data collected from millions of devices in intuitive ways. You will work directly with the design and product  teams to identify solutions and iterate quickly based on feedback. The features you build will provide actionable insights for our customers’ operations, and may involve anything  from design systems to performance engineering + design and develop features across a broad surface area with tangible impact on active and future customers. You will tackle engineering challenges ranging from architecting data structures for mass data collection to presenting data analytics in intuitive and performant ways on web and mobile.

Minimum requirements for the role:

  • You will complete a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field before July 2026


An ideal candidate also has:

  • Wants to win as a Team! Will champion, role model, and embed Samsara’s values (Focus on Customer Success, Build for the Long Term, Adopt a Growth Mindset, Be Inclusive, Win as a Team) as we scale globally and across new offices.
  • Has a builder mindset! we want to see that you have built or worked on production applications on your resume. We want students with multiple repositories in their GitHub demonstrating your software development journey.

Is customer obsessed! Finds excitement understanding our customers and what would make their day-to-day processes easier. Motivation comes from building and shipping customer experiences and seeks to iterate on new products based on customer feedback.

Overview

As a Data Scientist, you will help design, develop and program methods, processes and systems to consolidate and analyze unstructured, diverse “big data” sources to generate actionable insights and solutions for client services, product enhancement and business impact. This opportunity will allow you to interact with product and service teams to identify questions and hypotheses for data analysis and experiments. You will develop and code software programs, algorithms, models and automated processes to cleanse, integrate and evaluate large datasets from multiple disparate sources. 

 

[Required – do not edit statement] - [Official: Company Culture Statement] Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.   • You will learn and understand project objectives and requirements from a business perspective as well as assist senior leads with the assessment of a project, including risks, contingencies, requirements, assumptions, and constraints.

  • You will learn and understand various modeling techniques used within the team (e.g., linear regression, multiple regression, decision-tree building, neural network generation, support machines, derivatives) as well as run model tools on prepared dataset to create one or more models, seeking guidance as needed.

job_description:
Campus Graduates – Job Description

Course: IIT M. E / M. Tech

Position Overview: We are looking for bright and talented students who will be key contributors for engineering best products and solutions for our customers. Major Industries to work with: Industrial & Power, Mobility (Rail/ Automotive), Oil & Gas, Renewable Energy.

Eligible Streams: Machine Design, Chemical Engineering, Instrumentation & Controls Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, Pipeline Engineering and Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electrical & Instrumentation and Electrical Engineering (Power Systems)

Roles & Responsibilities (Typical activities to be performed – Any of the following)

Design Engineer

•       Concept and Detail Design – Component Design/ Machine Design

•       System & Sub-System Design

•       Design for 3D Production

•       Advance trends in design

•       Unified Engineering

Instrumentation & Controls

•       Engineering for DCS, ESD, F&G, HMI, PLC, SCADA, VFD

•       Calibration, Testing & Maintenance requirements of Instruments

•       Conceptual, Detailed Engineering Design with Process knowledge

•       Hazardous area classification, LOPA, PHA and SIL

•       Application knowledge on Process Control system and Safety Instrumented Systems including selections

•       Equipment Strategies development

•       Fire and Gas Systems with Protection systems


Chemical Engineer

•       Preparation of Process Flow Diagram, P&ID

•       HYSYS Simulations

•       Calculations & Sizing

•       Conceptual and Detailed Process Design for Projects (O & G, Water, Chemicals)- Set up scale-up and scale-down processes, including making appropriate changes, to equipment design and configuration

•       Assess options for plant expansion or reconfiguration by developing and testing process simulation models (ASPEN, HYSIS, HTRI)

•       Optimize production by analyzing processes and compiling debottleneck studies, investigate operating problems, analyze root causes and define mitigation plans

•       Support in Process Safety Operations-develop safety programs for safe operations

•       Participate in Process Hazard Analysis (PHA) and Process Safety Management (PSM) programs

•       Identify opportunities for cost reductions; implement new ideas to support for safe & reliable operations.


Electrical Engineer

•       Electrical Systems Engineering

•       Creation of Bill of Materials & Cable schedules

•       Conceptual, Detailed Engineering Design with Equipment Selection

•       Hazardous area classification

•       Power system Analysis

•       Equipment Strategies development

•       Maintenance Cost optimization and Reliability Techniques


Petroleum Engineer

•       Thorough understanding of Petroleum Engineering domain

•       Sound knowledge of Drilling, Production Operations, Reservoir Engineering and Geoscience

•       Work on production data to analyze trends, flag various anomalies on water cut, sand cut and GOR

•       Work on pressure and integrity data for X-tree and wellhead equipment

•       Work on Conventional Reservoir Engineering with skills in Decline Curves Analysis, Rate Transient Analysis, Wellbore Hydraulics calculations

•       Work on rock and fluids, formation facies and lithology data, fracking data for hydraulic fracking

•       Work on production from wells, artificial lift application and validate

•       Surveillance of drilling activity, daily reports and studying end of well reports

•       Monitor production levels of self-flowing wells, artificial lifted wells and sick wells

•       Track water, polymer, or gas injection for displacement techniques

•       Identify wells requiring attention for well workover

job_description:
Role Summary:

LAB37, the innovation lab of one of the India's leading airlines, is seeking a highly skilled AI Engineers to join our team, shaping the future of intelligent aviation. The ideal candidate should possess strong expertise in software engineering and machine learning, with a proven ability to translate research into scalable, real-world AI solutions.

In this role, you will collaborate within the lab and also with other AI Engineers, product teams, and technology partners to design, build, and deploy next-generation AI solutions and systems that power transformative experiences across the airline ecosystem—from customer engagement to operational excellence.

We are looking for a students who have a passion for experimentation, a commitment to quality, and then learn how to deliver production-grade AI applications that make measurable business impact within a fast-paced innovation environment.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Apply AI software engineering knowledge to design and deliver innovative software solutions and applications.
  • Translate state-of-the-art research around Agentic AI , Autonomous and adaptable AI and other data science and engineering methods into robust, maintainable, and scalable systems.
  • Conduct experiments to improve AI/ML models and analyse results to meet business requirements.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with engineering, product, and research teams to solve complex problems efficiently.
  • Work closely with fellow engineers and scientists to brainstorm and implement new ideas.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Strong proficiency in Python; experience with C/C++ is a plus.
  • Solid understanding of deep learning concepts and hands-on experience with frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
  • Experience training and deploying production-level deep learning models including Feedforward Neural Networks, CNNs, LSTMs, GANs, etc.
  • Familiarity with model optimization and deployment tools such as TensorRT, ONNX, or Triton Inference Server.
  • Proven track record of solving ML problems in domains such as Natural Language Processing (NLP) or Computer Vision (CV).
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to produce high-quality engineering documentation.


About IndiGo:

IndiGo is India’s largest and most preferred passenger airline and amongst the fastest-growing airlines in the world.

We have a simple philosophy: offer fares that are affordable, flights that are on time, and provide a courteous and hassle-free travel experience across our unparalleled network. We demonstrate that low cost does not mean low quality. With our fleet of 400+ aircraft, we operate well over 2,200 daily flights, connecting 130+ destinations (of which 40+ are international), welcoming 118 million+ customers on board last year. We have an industry-leading on-time performance and one of the highest customer NPS in the Indian market. At IndiGo, we will continue to extend our scope, by spreading our wings internationally, from a domestic carrier to a global aviation leader.

job_description:
About

Tara Capital Partners is an established diversified financial services firm that provides innovative solutions to the global Asset Management community. We serve the highly specialized and sophisticated needs of institutional clients. Our deep understanding of client requirements results in a comprehensive range of tailored solutions for Institutional Managers. We are a SEBI registered Trading Member and are committed to the continuous addition of cutting-edge trading strategies and systems to our existing suite.

We have developed a proprietary, best in class, Algorithmic Trading platform which we use for back testing and developing new algorithmic strategies. Our goal is to incorporate modern tools and global best practices in our research and development process to create a set of strategies that manage capital across markets and segments. We are looking for intelligent, motivated individuals who seek to work in a challenging, collegial environment to build institutional quality infrastructure and develop high alpha yielding strategies.

Role

As a Quantitative Developer, you will be instrumental in the full lifecycle of our investment strategies—from developing core alpha signals to implementing high-performance, automated systems. You will be responsible for spotting new opportunities, solving complex problems, and developing innovative technologies. This role requires a strong intersection of mathematical understanding, coding ability, and a dedication to system optimization and quality.

Responsibilities

  • Algorithm Development: Design, develop, back test, and implement low-frequency asset management strategies and core alpha signals, bringing our trading strategies to the next level.
  • Platform Engineering: Build, maintain, and enhance our high-performance trading platform and core software stack.
  • System Optimization: Utilize and optimize imperative languages (like C++ or Java) to refactor and implement performance-critical components of the trading platform.
  • Automation & Reporting: Design, build, and maintain robust automation systems for signal evaluation, risk management, and portfolio performance reporting.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with Traders, Quantitative Researchers, and other Engineers both locally and globally, developing expertise within the entire software development lifecycle.
  • Research & Learning: Conduct research to identify innovative data sources and quantitative signals and continuously learn new technologies and programming languages in a dynamic environment.

Requirements

  • Academic Status: Current university student pursuing a degree in Computer Science, or a related field
  • Algorithms & Data Structures: Must have strong foundational knowledge of core algorithms and data structures.
  • Programming Proficiency (System): Proficiency in a programming language is required, with a strong preference for high-performance language like C++
  • Programming Proficiency (Quantitative): Specific experience and deep familiarity with Python's scientific computing stack (Pandas, NumPy, etc.).
  • Analytical Skills: Strong analytical skills and interest in solving complex problems programmatically.
  • Mindset: Motivated, quick learner, self-starter with an entrepreneurial attitude, and a desire to interact and work closely with non-engineers in a dynamic environment.

job_description:
Aviso is seeking Data Scientists to work hand-in-hand with Aviso’s operations and development teams. You will be working with the founders, sales, product, and customer success teams to ensure that customers are delighted with Aviso solutions. You should be passionate about solving hard real-world enterprise problems by architecting, building and operating a highly scalable infrastructure.

This is the job for you, if…

● You are that unique person who is equally comfortable with understanding business, connecting the dots between business and data, thinking out of the box, involved in research with innovative ideas, solving deep and complex problems, and hands-on data science.

● Looking at, understanding and working with a large set of information (including feature engineering), a variety of datasets (including translating mathematics into programs), and data types (including text, image, speech processing).

This is what you’ll do…

● Work in the Data Science team and build Machine Learning models.

● Apply critical thinking skills for solving complex and challenging business problems.

● Continually evaluate new models and techniques to create solutions that will deliver increased value to business clients.

● Deploy NLP models on large-scale datasets to address various business problems leveraging advanced NLP, ML, or deep learning (DL) techniques.

● Provide the feedback loop to continually improve the tools and process to build industry leading products

and solutions.

● Work closely and communicate daily with engineering and customer success teams.

● Ship production ready code - Design, implement, test, and maintain features in the following core systems within our platform.

● A social graph of the world’s sales data, incorporating hundreds of millions of records related to sales, people, companies, and deals to create actionable advice for sales and marketing teams.

● An intelligent system for matching sales activity (e-mails, calendar data, calls) with sales data records from Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, incorporating both complex business rules and using Machine Learning to leverage the company’s social graph.

● Enhance our conversational intelligence platform capabilities with next generation NLP, Deep Learning & Computer Vision capabilities

● Continue to evolve our software development process to ensure customer-centric development with Product, Design, Data Science, and Engineering working together.

What we’re really looking for…

● Minimum of a Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in a field that provides a strong quantitative and programming background: Computer Science, Information Technology, Electrical / Electronics Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research, Economics etc. from Top Tier Institutions.

● Strong knowledge of Python and general software development skills (source code management, debugging, testing, deployment, etc)

● Having understanding of the following project or product features:

● Adaptive: They must learn as information changes, and as goals and requirements evolve. They must resolve ambiguity and tolerate unpredictability. They must be engineered to feed on dynamic data in real time.

● Interactive: They must interact easily with users so that those users can define their needs comfortably. They must interact with other processors, devices, services, as well as with people.

● Iterative and Stateful: They must aid in defining a problem by asking questions or finding additional source input if a problem statement is ambiguous or incomplete. They must remember previous interactions in a process and return information that is suitable for the specific application at that point in time.

● Contextual: They must understand, identify, and extract contextual elements such as meaning, syntax, time, location, appropriate domain, regulation, user profile, process, task and goal. They may draw on multiple sources of information, including both structured and unstructured digital information, as well as sensory inputs (visual, gestural, auditory, or sensor-provided).

● A great communicator - must be able to explain technical concepts and analysis implications clearly to varied audiences and be able to translate business objectives into actionable analyses.

Aviso offers...

● Dynamic, diverse, inclusive startup environment driven by transparency and velocity.

● Open working environment and collaborative office space.

● Competitive salaries and a focus on developing world class talent operations.

● Comprehensive health insurance available (medical) for you and your family.

● CEO innovation projects with cash awards, patent and publication bonus.

● Upskilling and learning support via paid conferences, online courses, and certifications
perks: Medical Insurance, Gratuity, Upskilling Allowance, Gym Reimbursement, Remote-first

Aviso is the AI Compass that guides Sales and Go-to-Market teams to close more deals, accelerate revenue growth, and find their True North. We are a global company with offices in Redwood City, San Francisco, and Hyderabad. Our customers are innovative leaders in their market. We are proud to count Dell, Honeywell, MongoDB, Glassdoor, Splunk, FireEye, and RingCentral as our customers, helping them drive revenue, achieve goals faster, and win in bold new frontiers. Aviso is backed by Storm Ventures, Shasta Ventures, Scale Venture Partners and leading Silicon Valley technology investors.

With our industry leading sales performance platform fueled by data science and predictive insights, Aviso is helping enterprises accelerate their sales, optimize their sales performance and exceed their revenue goals. With a proven track record of building high growth and highly successful technology companies, our team is completely focused on solving complex sales challenges and ensuring customer success.

Aviso is seeking Rockstar Backend Developers, to work in Aviso’s Engineering team. You will be working with the founders, sales, product, and customer success teams to ensure that customers are delighted with Aviso solutions. You should be passionate about solving hard real-world enterprise problems by architecting, building and operating a highly scalable infrastructure.


Backend Developer role gives you an opportunity to

• Work with back-end development and server- side engineering.

• Experience working with databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

• Write effective, scalable, extensible and testable code

• Detect the bottlenecks in legacy code and provide feasible solutions to make things better.

• Implement security and data protection solutions

• Coordinate with internal teams to understand user requirements and provide technical solutions

• A high degree of motivation to learn new technologies, tools and libraries

The ideal candidate will assist the sales and technical teams in understanding client requirements, preparing demonstrations, and supporting solution proposals. This is a great opportunity for recent graduates with strong technical aptitude and communication skills to begin a career in technical sales and solution consulting

job_description:
About Giga:

At Giga, we’re shaping the future of conversational AI, fully automating customer support to enterprise-grade levels with a lean team of exceptional engineers. Our customers trust our agents to navigate complex, real-world conversations with clarity, accuracy, and scalability. We’ve deployed AI agents that resolve over 1 million support tickets monthly for a single customer.

Today, we work with some of the most recognizable names in food delivery and crypto, rapidly establishing ourselves as a frontrunner in the space. With multi-year contracts across industries and We recently closed our $61M Series A and are expanding our engineering team, We’re on track to power the next trillion voice interactions. globally.

CTC: ₹45 LPA base + ₹10 LPA minimum bonus (up to ₹50 LPA maximum bonus).

Location: India (Remote)

Minimum CGPA: 9.0+

Why Join Us

Momentum: Join a team validated by both customers and investors

Ownership: Contribute to cutting-edge ML projects and shape our technical direction

Growth: Work alongside top-tier engineers and founders on ambitious, global products

About the Role

We’re seeking a Software Engineer with hands-on experience building and deploying LLM-based products from scratch. You should take pride in writing high-quality, scalable code and thrive in a fast-paced, high-ownership environment.

What You’ll Do

• Ship and own products — contribute rapidly and eventually lead your own product lines

• Design scalable solutions that remain fast, reliable, and secure as we grow

• Translate vision into execution — work with founders to turn ideas into impactful launches

Who You Are / Must-Haves

• Backend: Strong Python skills (Django experience is a plus)

• Frontend: Proficiency in Next.js, React, and ShadCN

• Cloud: Comfortable with AWS or Google Cloud

• Scalability: Familiarity with Kubernetes and Docker is a plus

• Mindset: High grit and a bias for ownership and long-hour productivity

job_description:
Data Scientist

Technology | Digital

Mission

The Data Scientist is responsible for conducting undirected research and tackle open-ended data problems and questions. Drawing on an advanced degree in a quantitative field such as computer science, physics, statistics or applied mathematics, the Data Scientist demonstrates the knowledge to invent new algorithms to solve data problems.

Responsibilities

  • Research and assess next-generation technologies for machinery diagnostics and prognostics and data-driven modeling and optimization of complex systems. Demonstrate advanced working knowledge and experience with machine learning algorithms and population-based meta-heuristic optimization methods.
  • Generate innovative ideas, establish new research directions, and shape and execute on technical projects.
  • Maintain state-of-the-art knowledge and contribute to technical discussions and reviews as an expert in related areas of responsibility.
  • Apply theoretical knowledge to solve industrial problems.
  • Apply engineering knowledge in developing data-driven algorithms for anomaly detection, failure prediction and optimization.
  • Collaborate with field and product engineers to identify key health monitoring parameters of a system.
  • Process large multivariate data sets collected from equipment operations, manufacturing tests and diagnostic routines.
  • Communicate ideas, plans and results effectively via oral and written reports.

Experience & Exposures:

  • Data Science and Analytics
  • Algorithmic Development

  • Passion for AI research, generative models and bridging theory with scalable applications
