job_description: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gRyqsHf3ESjCXsTI4UQ7JJIVOOD2w-bO/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=106452775992175567132&rtpof=true&sd=true

Overview

Boeing is the world’s largest aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace. 


In India, Boeing has been a strong partner to the Indian aerospace and defense sectors for more than 75 years. People at Boeing have been supporting mission readiness and modernization of India’s defense forces, and enabling connected, safer, and smarter flying experiences, in the sky, in the seas, and in space. 


Technology for today and tomorrow

The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. Our engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, Cloud, AR/VR, Mobile application development (Android and iOS), AI, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, shaping the future of aerospace. 


People-driven culture

At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing. 


At Boeing, we are inclusive, diverse, and transformative.  

With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.

Boeing India Engineering team is currently looking to hire Associate Software Engineer for Boeing India Software Engineering (BISE) to join their team in Bengaluru, India. As a Software Engineer, you will be part of the Embedded Software Solutions team, which develops software applications and products that create direct value to its customers. We provide re-vamped work environments focused on delivering data-driven solutions at a rapidly increased pace over traditional development. Be a part of our passionate and motivated team who are excited to use the latest software technologies for modern web and mobile application development. Through our products we deliver innovative solutions to our global customer base at an accelerated pace

We are looking for a dynamic and multi-talented Software Engineer with a strong passion for Securely Connected Systems, with an interest in Connected Cargo and Commercial aerospace industry. The ideal candidate should demonstrate a solid fundamental of IOT, WIFI, BLE, Cellular, Condor Scanner, 2D/3D image processing, Volumetric Analysis, Strong fundamentals of Cyber Security and strong programming skills. Additionally, experience or a keen interest in big data analysis, video streaming technologies, Linux Kernal Optimization and AI-based applications is highly valued. This role also calls for technical leadership to guide multidisciplinary teams while actively contributing to product development.

Position Responsibilities:

  • Spearhead the vision for connected cargo and commercials projects, aligning with business objectives and customer needs.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including Systems, Product Designers and Software Engineers to manage the product lifecycle.
  • Define and prioritize product features based on market research, customer feedback and industry trends.
  • Serve as a developer specializing in IOT, WIFI, BLE, Cellular, Condor Scanner, 2D/3D image processing, video streaming, and AI. Offering mentorship and converting technical requirements into clear, actionable implementable tasks.
  • Ensure timely recommendation and delivery of Cyber/Network/End-point Security Features, managing risks and expectations throughout the development cycle.
  • Contribute to the Boeing India Engineering team by developing, maintaining, and enhancing cargo and commercial aviation software products using optimized technologies.
  • Define system requirements and actively participate in software development, collaborating with diverse teams across global locations.
  • Drive Cyber vulnerability test framework, periodic cyber bulletins along with security patch releases.
  • Create and maintain software design and architecture documentation, focusing on future maintenance costs.
  • Collaborate with international teams to promote knowledge sharing and competency development.
  • Recommend system enhancements, research new requirements, and promote continuous capability improvements.
  • Use data produced and captured by systems to improve systems performance using volumetric and big data analytics.
  • Be open to occasional domestic and international travel as required.

Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status. 

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or related field.
  • Strong IOT, WIFI, BLE and Cellular technologies understanding.
  • Well versed with Condor Scanner, 2D/3D image building/processing and video streaming technologies.
  • Familiar with Volumetric and Big Data Analysis
  • Strong fundamentals of Cyber, Network and End-Point security. 
  • Experience in Linux programming and Kernal Optimization is desirable.
  • AI-based technologies applications are highly valued.
  • Proficiency in optimized programming in Embedded C, C++, Java/Python.
  • Excellent critical thinking skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
  • Effective communication and technical leadership potential to guide multidisciplinary teams.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies is a plus.
  • Must have a passion for aviation and aerospace technologies.

Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):

  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Embedded C, C++, Java/Python, RUST, PyTest.
  • Strong experience with various network protocols like TCP/IP, UDP 
  • Ability to identify the right skills for the right projects, experience coaching and mentoring peers and/or reports to continuous learning and improvement 
  • Strong Working knowledge of Automation and CI/CD process including debugging, test, and integration of software tools. 
  • Strong communication skills and a self-starter that can thrive in a distributed remote work environment. 
  • Experience working with international teams outside standard operating hours 
  • Understanding of designing and implementing Micro-service infrastructure. 
  • Experience with Agile planning tools such as JIRA, TSF 
  • Experience with Linux OS, Yocto, Ubuntu, NodeJS, NGINX, Docker

role: Core Engineering & Technology, IT / Software, Manufacturing
job_description: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1M_wu7Z9LvXfVjgS5P7SGsGzgf_EK1zlM/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=106452775992175567132&rtpof=true&sd=true

Overview

Boeing is the world’s largest aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace. 

In India, Boeing has been a strong partner to the Indian aerospace and defense sectors for more than 75 years. People at Boeing have been supporting mission readiness and modernization of India’s defense forces, and enabling connected, safer, and smarter flying experiences, in the sky, in the seas, and in space. 

Technology for today and tomorrow

The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. Our engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, Cloud, AR/VR, Mobile application development (Android and iOS), AI, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, shaping the future of aerospace. 

People-driven culture

At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing. 


At Boeing, we are inclusive, diverse, and transformative.  

With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.

Boeing India Engineering team is currently looking to hire Associate Software Engineer for Boeing India Software Engineering (BISE) to join their team in Bengaluru, India. As a Software Engineer, you will be part of the Boeing Global Services Training Solutions team, which develops software applications and products that create direct value to its customers. We provide re-vamped work environments focused on delivering data-driven solutions at a rapidly increased pace over traditional development. Be a part of our passionate and motivated team who are excited to use the latest in software technologies for modern web and mobile application development. Through our products we deliver innovative solutions to our global customer base at an accelerated pace

We are looking for a motivated and talented Software Engineer with a strong passion for augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR), ideally with an interest in the aviation industry. The ideal candidate should demonstrate a solid enthusiasm for AR/VR technologies, familiarity with Unity or Unreal Engine, and strong programming skills. Additionally, experience or a keen interest in mobile application development (Android/iOS), video streaming technologies, and AI-based applications is highly valued. This role also calls for leadership potential to guide multidisciplinary teams while actively contributing to coding and product development.

Position Responsibilities:

  • Spearhead the vision, strategy, and roadmap for Maintenance and Flight training projects, aligning with business objectives and customer needs.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including developers, designers, and engineers to manage the product lifecycle.
  • Define and prioritize product features based on market research, user feedback, and industry trends.
  • Serve as a developer specializing in AR/VR, Unity/Unreal, mobile app development, video streaming, and AI, offering mentorship and converting technical requirements into clear, actionable development tasks.
  • Ensure timely delivery of high-quality Unity/Unreal, mobile, and AI-based products, managing risks and expectations throughout the development cycle.
  • Contribute to the Boeing India Engineering team by developing, maintaining, and enhancing aviation software products across AR/VR, mobile, and AI domains.
  • Define system requirements and actively participate in software development, collaborating with diverse teams across locations.
  • Drive Epic/Feature/Story creation and solution design within an Agile environment, fostering effective communication and solution architecture.
  • Create and maintain software design and architecture documentation, focusing on reducing technical debt.
  • Collaborate with international teams to promote knowledge sharing and competency development.
  • Recommend system enhancements, research new requirements, and promote continuous capability improvements.
  • Be open to occasional domestic and international travel as required.

Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status. 

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or related field.
  • Strong understanding of AR/VR concepts and technologies.
  • Strong understanding of Unity and/or Unreal Engine.
  • Experience or interest in mobile application development for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Knowledge of video streaming technologies and AI-based application development is a plus.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, C++, Java, Kotlin, Swift, or Python.
  • Excellent critical thinking skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
  • Effective communication and leadership potential to guide multidisciplinary teams.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies is a plus.
  • Passion for aviation and aerospace technology is highly desirable.

Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):

  • Proficiency in programming languages commonly for development, such as C#, C++, Java, Unity and Unreal Engine.
  • Proficiency in React Native for cross-platform mobile development (iOS & Android)
  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript
  • Strong knowledge of state management tools such as Redux.
  • Comfortable using build tools such as Xcode and Android Studio.
  • Familiarity with native module integration (Java/Kotlin for Android, Swift/Objective-C for iOS)
  • Strong Knowledge cloud platforms like Microsoft Azure
  • Strong knowledge of app deployment to the Google Play Store and Apple App Store
  • Knowledge of Web APIs: Understanding how to interact with various web APIs, such as fetching data from a server or integrating with third-party services
  • RESTful APIs: Understanding how to design and build RESTful APIs using Node.js is crucial for creating scalable and efficient web services.
  • Database Integration: Knowledge of working with databases, such as MongoDB or MySQL, and using database libraries or ORMs (Object-Relational Mapping) in Node.js is important for data storage and retrieval.
  • Web Security: Familiarity with web security best practices, such as input validation, authentication, and authorization.
  • Version Control: Familiarity with version control systems like Git is important for collaborating with other developers and managing code changes.
  • Deployment and DevOps: Knowledge of deploying Node.js applications to production environments, containerization (e.g., Docker), and basic DevOps concepts are beneficial for full-stack development.

Relocation:

  • This position does offer relocation within INDIA. 

What We Offer:

  • Opportunity to work on innovative AR/VR, mobile, and AI projects in the aviation industry.
  • Exposure to global teams and cutting-edge aerospace technologies.
  • A collaborative and inclusive work environment fostering professional growth.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits.


If you are passionate about AR/VR, mobile, and AI technologies and eager to contribute to the future of aviation training, we encourage you to apply and join Boeing’s dynamic engineering team!

job_description:
About RISA Labs

At RISA, we are building the future of mission-critical workflows by leveraging the latest in AI. Our purpose is to solve humanity’s hardest hurdles, and we are starting with the incredibly high-stakes challenges within oncology. We’re not just selling software; we are delivering a new kind of resilient, autonomous infrastructure that powers foundational institutions and ultimately helps accelerate human progress.

Founders

RISA was founded by Kshitij Jaggi and Kumar Shivang, IIT Kanpur alumni with a proven track record from their previous healthcare startup, Urban Health. Their vision is to streamline oncology care through cutting-edge technology.

Funding

RISA Labs is backed by $3.5 million in seed funding, led by Flipkart co-founder Binny Bansal, with support from Oncology Ventures, General Catalyst, z21 Ventures, Odd Bird VC, and angel investor Ashish Gupta.

The Opportunity

As a Product Designer at RISA Labs, you’ll play a key role in shaping the interfaces, interactions, and experiences that power the future of healthcare technology. You’ll work closely with product managers, engineers, and clinical experts to craft intuitive and elegant designs that solve complex problems in simple, human ways. This is a great fit for someone who thrives on transforming deep tech and AI complexity into clear, meaningful user experiences that drive adoption and impact.

What You’ll do

  • System Design & Development: Contribute to the design and development of scalable systems integrating backend services, AI pipelines, and automation engines. Learn to build modular, efficient architectures under guidance
  • Integration & Interoperability: Support the integration of systems across multiple platforms including AI services, data engines, automation systems and enterprise applications
  • Performance & Optimization: Assist in monitoring and improving system performance to ensure reliability, low latency and scalability
  • Cloud & Infrastructure: Gain hands-on experience with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), containerized systems (Docker, Kubernetes), and serverless technologies
  • Security & Compliance: Learn and apply best practices for data privacy, encryption, and access control to meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, SOC 2, and ISO 27001
  • Collaboration & Communication: Work closely with engineering, product, and AI teams to understand system requirements and contribute to implementation plans
  • Technical Learning & Growth: Participate in technical discussions, receive mentorship from senior architects, and continuously develop expertise in system design and cloud technologies
  • Technology Research: Stay updated on emerging technologies and tools to suggest innovative solutions that enhance performance and developer efficiency

What You’ll Bring

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
  • Strong understanding of programming fundamentals (Python, Java, or Go preferred)
  • Basic knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization concepts
  • Familiarity with APIs, databases (SQL/NoSQL), and data flow concepts
  • Interest in system design, distributed computing, and modern infrastructure technologies
  • Eagerness to learn about security, compliance, and scalable architecture principles
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills, with a collaborative mindset
  • Enthusiasm for working in cross-functional teams and contributing to complex engineering projects

job_description:
Summary:

We are building MFT (Medium Frequency Trading) and HFT (High Frequency Trading) systems operating at the intersection of quantitative research and high-performance technology. Our core strength lies in developing and deploying algorithmic trading strategies that operate across global markets in microseconds. We embrace a culture of collaboration, intellectual curiosity, and continuous innovation.

As a Quantitative Developer, you will be immersed in the process of developing and analyzing systematic trading strategies. You’ll work with large datasets, perform statistical analysis, backtest ideas, and help enhance our trading models. This role is designed for candidates who are deeply analytical, curious about financial markets, and skilled at translating data into actionable insights.

Job Responsibilities: • Alpha Research: Analyze financial and alternative data to identify patterns, signals, and anomalies that can be used to develop profitable trading strategies.

• Backtesting & Simulation: Design and implement robust backtesting frameworks to test ideas using historical data, with careful attention to slippage, latency, and transaction costs.

• Statistical Modeling: Apply techniques from machine learning, time series forecasting, and mathematical finance to evaluate hypotheses and build predictive models.

• Data Analysis: Transform, model and analyze large datasets from multiple asset classes including equities, commodities, futures and options.

• Collaboration: Work closely with traders, software engineers, and fellow quants to refine strategies and ensure seamless integration into production systems.

Knowledge, Competency and Skills requirement:

• Strong foundation in probability, statistics, linear algebra, optimization, and time series analysis.

• Proficiency in Python, R, or MATLAB for numerical and data analysis; knowledge of C++ is a plus.

• Experience working with large datasets, preferably in a Linux environment.

• Familiarity with pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, PyTorch, or other relevant libraries.

• Prior exposure to financial markets or algorithmic trading concepts is a plus but not required.

• Strong problem-solving skills and a curiosity-driven mindset.

• Passion for financial markets.

• Entrepreneurial, enterprising and an agile mindset.

• Ability to adapt to a dynamic work environment and show exceptional prowess at managing large impact situations.

• Keen to learn, hungry for growth.

• Flexibility to work independently and as a part of the team.

• Strong quantitative aptitude and high EQ.

Preferred Skills:

• Strong Mathematics and Statistics foundation.

• Experience with machine learning, reinforcement learning, or Bayesian modeling.

• Participation in math/CS/quant competitions (e.g., Kaggle, QuantInsti, Olympiads).

• Knowledge about financial derivatives market.

The Opportunity


As a Product Manager at RISA Labs, you’ll sit at the intersection of technology, healthcare, and design - shaping how AI-driven systems transform oncology workflows. You’ll partner closely with engineering, design, and GTM teams to translate complex healthcare challenges into intuitive, scalable products that deliver real impact. This role is ideal for someone who thrives on problem-solving, enjoys working cross-functionally, and wants to see their ideas translate into meaningful outcomes for clinicians and patients.



What You’ll do


  • Drive the end-to-end product lifecycle - from problem definition and discovery to launch and iteration
  • Work closely with engineering and AI teams to turn product concepts into reliable, scalable solutions
  • Collaborate with clinical experts, users, and customers to deeply understand their workflows and challenges
  • Define and own product requirements, success metrics, and roadmaps that align with business goals
  • Translate complex AI and technical concepts into simple, clear product narratives and user experiences
  • Partner with founders and leadership to shape product vision, strategy, and go-to-market readiness
  • Constantly measure impact, gather feedback, and iterate - ensuring that every release moves us closer to our mission



What You’ll Bring


  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
  • Internships or projects in product strategy, UX, or system design are a plus
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills - you can connect the dots between user needs, tech feasibility, and business goals
  • A builder’s mindset - comfortable working in ambiguity, taking ownership, and making data-informed decisions
  • Curiosity for AI, healthcare, and how technology can make systems more human, efficient, and impactful
  • A bias for action - you like moving fast, learning fast, and seeing tangible outcomes from your work

Founders About Risa Labs

At RISA, we are building the future of mission-critical workflows by leveraging the latest in AI. Our purpose is to solve humanity’s hardest hurdles, and we are starting with the incredibly high-stakes challenges within oncology. We’re not just selling software; we are delivering a new kind of resilient, autonomous infrastructure that powers foundational institutions and ultimately helps accelerate human progress.

Founders

RISA was founded by Kshitij Jaggi and Kumar Shivang, IIT Kanpur alumni with a proven track record from their previous healthcare startup, Urban Health. Their vision is to streamline oncology care through cutting-edge technology.

Funding

RISA Labs is backed by $3.5 million in seed funding, led by Flipkart co-founder Binny Bansal, with support from Oncology Ventures, General Catalyst, z21 Ventures, Odd Bird VC, and angel investor Ashish Gupta.

The Opportunity

As a Member of Technical Staff at Risa Labs, you’ll be part of the core engineering team building scalable, high-impact systems that power our healthcare AI solutions. We’re looking for bright, curious minds in engineering with strong foundations in Python, data structures, algorithms, and system design. This role is ideal for fresh graduates who are eager to solve challenging problems, work on distributed systems and backend technologies, and learn hands-on in a fast-moving startup environment. If you enjoy turning ideas into real, impactful products and thrive in a culture of collaboration and innovation, this is the place to start your journey.

What You’ll do

  • Design, Develop, and Deploy scalable software systems with strong emphasis on Python-based applications and backend engineering
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, researchers, and engineers to translate complex problems into elegant, efficient solutions
  • Contribute to System Design discussions and assist in building reliable, high-performance architectures
  • Write clean, testable, and maintainable code following best practices in coding standards, version control, and CI/CD
  • Debug, optimize, and improve system performance, ensuring solutions meet both technical and business requirements
  • Learn and grow continuously through mentorship, technical reviews, and exposure to cutting-edge problems in healthcare and AI systems

What You’ll Bring

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
  • Strong foundation in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and NLP, with hands-on experience in developing or deploying LLM-based systems
  • Practical exposure to model fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and optimization for performance and scalability
  • Proficiency in Python and common ML frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow)
  • Knowledge of system design fundamentals (distributed systems, APIs, databases, cloud concepts)
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with ability to break down complex problems into structured solutions
  • Experience with projects/internships involving backend systems, scalable applications, or research-oriented software development is a plus
  • Eagerness to learn, collaborate, and innovate in a fast-paced startup environment

We are building MFT (Medium Frequency Trading) and HFT (High Frequency Trading) systems which are scalable, automated, and extremely fast. We want passionate people to be part of this journey with us. As a Software Developer, you will be part of a collaborative engineering team that develops, optimizes, and maintains the core trading infrastructure. This role offers an exceptional opportunity to apply your computer science knowledge to real-world problems involving high throughput, low latency, and high availability. You will contribute to building systems that process large volumes of market data, execute orders in nanoseconds, and manage complex state across global trading venues. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of C++ and low latency coding, be proficient in low level design, and possess a passion for delivering high-quality code. • Design and develop low-latency trading software in C++ for high-frequency trading systems.

• Troubleshoot and debug issues in production environments.

• Explore and adopt new technologies that can improve trading efficiency and execution quality.

• Stay abreast of advancements in trading technology and implement improvements to enhance efficiency.

job_description:
Summary

At Apple, everything begins with an exceptional customer experience, and the

Operations Test Engineering team plays a key role in making that possible.

This team tests every product we build and drives innovation by developing

and deploying cutting-edge test solutions directly in our manufacturing sites.

We are seeking highly motivated students who are eager to tackle complex

engineering challenges, collaborate with global suppliers, and implement

advanced test solutions using statistical analysis, modeling, and machine

learning tools.

Key Responsibilities

1. Testing & Validation

• Help design and run test systems that check the performance and

quality of Apple products.

• Support validation of new hardware and software features before mass

production.

2. Data & Analysis

• Collect and analyze factory test data to find patterns, issues, or

improvement opportunities.

• Use tools like Python or MATLAB to study data and create simple

reports or dashboards.

job_description:
Larsen & Toubro (L&T) believes that building extraordinary infrastructure, engineering solutions, and technological innovations begins with building extraordinary leaders. The Management Trainee (MT) Program is a strategic initiative to identify, develop, and nurture high-potential talent who will contribute as future leaders of the organization. The program offers exposure to strategic and challenging business projects, supported by a structured learning journey that blends on-the-job experiences with formal learning interventions. This program is designed for accelerated career progression, empowering trainees to take on impactful responsibilities early in their careers.


As part of the Management Trainee Program, selected MTs will gain exposure to challenging projects, structured learning interventions, and fast-tracked career growth opportunities. The program also includes a one-year structured mentorship initiative called MPower, where each trainee will be a part of a guided mentoring relationship with a Senior Leader at L&T, MTs develop strong leadership capabilities alongside their technical skills, gaining practical insights and professional direction that prepare them for future leadership roles at L&T.


If you are driven by purpose, passionate about tackling real-world challenges, and eager to learn from some of the finest minds in engineering and management, L&T offers an empowering platform to lead, innovate, and grow. Join us to build the future—and shape your own leadership journey with impact.

job_description:
What you ll build -

  • Design, implement, document, and maintain various modules within SAP Database Platform
  • Identify areas of improvements to current design and advocates alternative method to enhance current working set
  • Innovate, File Patents and generate IP for SAP.
  • Provide alternative diagnostic methods to resolve both in house and customer reported problems
  • Design, Debug, analyze and resolve complex database engine problems of customers and SAP internal stakeholders
  • Own and work with engineering team in different geographic locations to diagnose and resolve design issues and customer reported problems
  • Articulate technical information clearly. Provide training and assist on knowledge transfer 
  • Prioritize tasks, develop detailed design, and estimate effort required to completion of projects
  • Publish Technical white papers for SAP Database Customers
  • Analyze performance and scalability of the SAP database products
  • Follow the software development cycle from inception and requirement to successful release of product

What you bring- 

  • Good knowledge of database architecture. 
  • Must have a strong knowledge of the C, C++ Programming language with expertise in Database internals and/or operating system internals with strong debugging skills. 
  • Must have exposure to cloud technologies including Docker and Kubernetes 
  • Advanced LINUX and UNIX skills and experience (specifically with multi-threaded architecture, synchronization mechanism, etc.) 
  • System level design expertise such as OS drivers, file systems, access methods, query processing, query optimization, memory management, multi-threading and concurrency control, networking will be a strong plus
  • Experience in distributed computing development such as distributed database design, cluster file system etc., will be a strong plus
  • Must be able to multi-task and work independently, take initiative to prioritize and resolve problems
  • Must have excellent verbal and communication skills

Where you belong

SAP HANA Cloud is a cloud-based database management system and a core component of the SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP). The SAP HANA Cloud Platform is the basis for a disruptive technology that fosters new design thinking in the application space. It leverages technology innovation to establish real-time analysis of business data and combines both transactions and analytics to improve existing business processes with a dramatic increase in performance. 

We are currently seeking highly talented and motivated development engineers to work on

SAP HANA Cloud Database Products and Technology. As a successful candidate for this role, you will have excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, fluency in coding and systems design, solid

communication skills and a desire to solve complex problems of scale which are uniquely SAP.

You will use your skills and your initiative to improve the functionality and performance of these systems. You will develop and enhance core components of these servers in a wide variety of areas (ex: query processing, database store and access methods, distributed subsystems, etc.). Architect and build resilient and highly available services around database solutions which provide scalable performance. You will also have opportunities to work on HANA cloud technologies topics, design innovative solutions to support existing databases on public cloud infrastructure. Come up with features useful to support databases in the cloud environment.

In addition to current technology, you will also work on new exciting technologies to assure SAP’s continuous leadership in the Marketplace.

job_description:
We are searching for excellent analytical minds who are keen to solve innovative and challenging problems in an environment that fosters scalable and performant engineering and personal growth. You will have the opportunity work with Cloud technologies, enterprise-scale stack including: 

  • Programming languages: Java, Golang, Python
  • Runtime: Modular Java runtime based on OSGi specifications. 
  • Scripting languages: Groovy, Python 
  • UI: JavaScript, CSS, HTML, SAP UI5, Eclipse 
  • Storage: RDBMS (Sybase ASE, Postgres), non-RDBMS (Mongo, Cassandra), InfluxDb time series database 
  • Messaging: Apache ActiveMQ, Kafka, Solace
  • Other frameworks: Apache CXF, Apache Camel, Hystrix and many other open-source frameworks
  • Technical Connectivity Adapters: REST, HTTP, SOAP, LDAP, FTP, JMS, AMQP
  • Business Connectivity Adapters: EDI, AS2, AS4, EB-XML etc. 
  • IaaS (Infrastructure as a service): SAP hosted cloud, AWS, GCP/GKE, Azure, OpenStack and Ali Cloud
  • PaaS (Platform as a service): Cloud Foundry
  • CaaS (Container as a service): Docker/RKT, Kubernetes

What you’ll build:

  • Collaborate with a mentor from the vibrant architecture community. 
  • Demonstrate excellent quality, design, development, and delivery skills in scrum teams working in short development and release cycles. 
  • Use and extend Open-Source frameworks heavily and possibly contribute to them as well. 
  • Contribute to DevOps for Cloud Integration - Work with geographically distributed teams seamlessly

What you’ll bring:

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills 
  • Excellent understanding of data structures and algorithms 
  • Optional: Introduction to the concepts of functional and object-oriented paradigms

Where you belong

The product unit, SAP Cloud Integration within SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) LoB is providing integration technology on cloud to SAP applications, partners, and customers. 

SAP Cloud Integration Suite is SAP’s strategic Enterprise Integration Platform as a service offering (EiPaas) running on SAP BTP. With more than 12,000+ customers, SAP Cloud Integration is one of the most successful cloud services at SAP. In line with SAP’s multi-cloud strategy, our service is running on various infrastructure providers including Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure. Recently, Gartner rated SAP Cloud Integration Suite as the “Customer Choice” for Enterprise Integration Platform as a service.

The unique value proposition of the platform is to provide Out-of-the-box integrations with prepackaged integrations from SAP and its partners to seamlessly provide A2A, B2B and B2G capabilities in cloud-to-cloud/on premise-to-cloud environments which helps in significantly reducing integration project lead times for its customers.

role: Analytics, IT / Software, Data Science/ AI/ ML
job_description:
What you will build

We are part of the Office of the CTO (Chief Technology Officer), and therefore we work on topics that directly support the SAP CTO’s mandate. We investigate front-runner technologies to verify, experiment, and create proof-points that inform technical decisions. Our work includes technology strategy initiatives such as the North Star Architecture, along with related research, investigations, coding experiments, and the creation of Reference Architectures.

 

As a member of our team, you will be responsible for prototyping, building showcases, and experimenting with new technologies. You will research internal and external products, concepts, and architectures, and contribute to concept and strategy papers as needed. A strong combination of architectural thinking, abstraction skills, and hands-on coding experience is highly valuable for this role.

Your work will involve:

• Developing tooling and content (reference architectures across Data, AI, Platform, Data, AI and Agents) that is published on the SAP Architecture Center

• Exploring emerging technologies across AI and Agents, including

Neuro-symbolic AI, Knowledge Graphs, MCP (Model Context Protocol), Agent Orchestration, RAG, and other AI-native patterns

• Working on non-functional aspects such as Security, HA/DR, Performance, and Reliability

• Prototyping and building proof-points that influence company-wide strategic decisions

• Contributing to concept notes, technical investigations, and strategy documents


What you bring

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

• Hands-on skills in full-stack engineering (backend/frontend/data/integration/ML or GenAI)

• Knowledge of SAP BTP or public cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) is a plus

• Understanding or curiosity around Data, AI and agent-based architectures

• Proficiency in one or more programming languages

• Strong presentation, articulation, and storytelling abilities

• Curiosity for emerging technologies and willingness to learn fast

 

Why this role is different

You will work where research becomes architecture and architecture becomes code, influencing technology direction across SAP before it reaches product teams.

If you want to begin your career where strategy meets engineering and experimentation drives decisions, this team is the right place.

 

Where you belong

You will join the Office of the CTO (OCTO), the team that works on technology topics relevant to the entire company and product units and, in many cases, on ideas before they become mainstream inside SAP. We explore front-runner technologies, run experiments, build proof-points, and support CTO and Executive Board level strategic projects. A core part of our work is shaping and publishing Reference Architectures that guide how SAP and its ecosystem build interoperable and future-ready enterprise solutions. These architectures are externally published via the SAP Architecture Center and are consumed by customers, partners, and engineering teams across SAP.

 

You will work in an internationally blended team based in India, collaborating closely with peers in Germany and the USA. Because our topics are high-impact, strategic, and evolve rapidly, continuous learning, fast skill acquisition, and comfort with ambiguity are essential.

As a Product Analyst at VMock, you will play a pivotal role in converting complex business questions into actionable data insights. Your expertise in data analysis will support the development and optimization of our products, ultimately enhancing the user experience and driving business growth.

Data Analysis & Insights:

Product Development Support:

● Collaborate with Product Managers to define product features and roadmap priorities based on data-driven insights.

● Assist in the design and implementation of new product features, ensuring they meet user needs and business goals.

● Participate in user testing and feedback sessions to refine product offerings.

Collaboration with Data Science Team:

Reporting & Visualization:

User Experience Enhancement:

● Analyze user feedback and engagement metrics to identify opportunities for product improvement.

● Propose and test hypotheses to enhance user satisfaction and retention.

● Collaborate with UX/UI designers to ensure data-driven design decisions.

Market Research & Competitive Analysis:

● Conduct market research to stay abreast of industry trends and competitor strategies.

● Provide insights on market opportunities and potential areas for product differentiation.

Job Summary: Eaton Corporation’s Centre for Intelligent Power located at Eaton India’s Innovation Centre in Pune and global headquarters in Dublin, applies data science to transform all aspects of our company. We’re working on solving the technical challenges of today’s digital world, while developing ground-breaking technology that’s going to power the next generation of futuristic products and services. The Data Science Engineer will be involved in the design and development of ML/AI algorithms to solve power management problems. In addition to developing these algoriths, the Data Science Engineer will also be involved in successful integration of algorithms in edge or cloud systems using CI/CD and software release process.

Knowledge on Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Recommendation AI Systems

- Knowelldge on open source projects like Open CV, Gstreamer, OpenVINO, ONNX, Tensor flow, Pytorch and Caffe

company_name: Bajaj Auto Limited & Chetak Technology Limited
job_description:
About Operations- Engineering

In Bajaj Auto, Engineering department is the core function which ensures optimistic process flow in the components manufacturing. Hence plays a very important and key role in Manufacturing its products. Engineering function in Bajaj Auto is divided first into 2 groups and then into different verticals as per manufacturing processes and horizontals as per below.

Verticals:

  • ïCasting and Machining 
  • ïForging and Machining 
  • ïPress & Fabrication
  • ïPainting and Decal application
  • ïAssembly and Testing
  • ïEV parts
  • ïTool Engineering (Press Tools and Pressure Die Casting)

Horizontals:

  • ïSystems 

Key Responsibilities

Group 1 – Process Engineering

  • ïCritical Components development – While the Supply Chain (Materials) department handles most component development, a few critical components are developed by the Engineering team, following a similar process: R&D releases the component drawing, which is checked for manufacturability and reliability. The drawing is then explained to the vendor.
  • ïThe component development engineer oversees the vendor’s work, following the 7-step review process (DR1 to DR7).
  • ïDuring development, the engineer learns and applies concepts like DFM, DFA, PFMEA, DFMEA, 7QC Tools, MSA, SPC, PPAP, and QMS, along with basic costing.
  • ïThe new component is inspected for quality and dimensional accuracy by the SIR department using precision equipment like CMM (Coordinate Measuring Machine).
  • ïUpon SIR approval, the vendor begins batch production based on the requirements.


Process improvement – 

  • ïThe process engineering team in all the verticals continuously studies the best manufacturing processes being followed worldwide.
  • ïPlan and execute DOEs based on above studies in coordination with Materials department at vendors
  • ïStudy materials composition in materials laboratory and share the technical feedback to R&D.
  • ïDesign IPO sheet and Process SOP in CFT with R&D, Materials, CQA & VQA


Tool Engineering – 

  • ïDesign press tools and Pressure Die casting dies required across BAL including vendors
  • ïPeriodic maintenance of above dies


Group 2 – Machine & Automation Technology

  • ïEngineering Machine & Automation Technology department is the driving core behind the company's manufacturing capability, responsible for the design, development, deployment, and maintenance of cutting-edge production systems. It operates at the intersection of mechanical engineering, robotics, software development, and digital technology, driving efficiency, quality, and the realization of Industry 4.0 principles.
  • ïAutomation & Robotics: Assisting in the design and application of Special Purpose Machines (SPMs) and robotic cells (Collaborative & Autonomous Mobile Robots).
  • ïDigital Integration: Supporting the deployment of IIoT, Digital Twin, and MES (Manufacturing Execution Systems) for real-time data analysis and system optimization.
  • ïMachine System Fundamentals: Learning the practical application of hydraulic, pneumatic, lubrication, and cooling systems in manufacturing equipment.
  • ïControl & Software: Supporting the development and troubleshooting of Electrical Design and Control Systems for automated equipment.
  • ïAssembly & Commissioning: Participating directly in the assembly, tryout, and quality control checks for new manufacturing assets.


What are we looking for?

  • ïStrong understanding of Mechanical/ Electrical/ Mechatronics/ Robotics fundamentals. 
  • ïFunctional knowledge of systems controls (hydraulics, pneumatics, lubrication and coolant)
  • ïFoundational proficiency in programming languages
  • ïKeen interest in adopting & implementing new/ emerging technologies.
  • ïStrong Analytical & Problem-solving skills


What’s in it for you?

  • ïBe part of a structured program designed to fast-track your professional growth.
  • ïGain hands-on experience by contributing to impactful and high-visibility projects.
  • ïReceive guidance from senior leaders and Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) who will support your career development.
  • ïWork closely with top business leaders, gaining insights into strategic thinking and decision-making.
  • ïPartner with key vendors and cross-functional teams to understand end-to-end business operations.
  • ïDevelop a strong understanding of the full strategic and execution lifecycle within a dynamic work environment.

profile: Flying Start Graduate Trainee Engineer (BATL R&D)
job_description:
About BATL

Bajaj Auto Technology Limited (BATL) is a pioneer in electric mobility innovation. BATL’s EV R&D focus spans traction motors, battery technology, power electronics, intelligent systems, and embedded software, ensuring our electric vehicle platforms set benchmarks for performance, reliability, and sustainability. We push the boundaries of innovation, empowering you to think beyond the status quo alongside highly talented teams across motor design, EV electronics, BMS, embedded software, and intelligent systems.

As a Graduate Trainee Engineer – BATL R&D, you will join BATL’s elite EV teams, gaining hands-on exposure to next-generation electric mobility systems. This role is designed for top-performing graduates from premier engineering institutes passionate about technology, innovation, and building the future of electric vehicles.


You will work across specialized EV domains, including:

➢ EV Electronics & Hardware: Charging systems, Battery Management Systems (BMS), High Voltage & Low Voltage DC Systems, MCUs, DC-DC Converters, PCB Design, EMC Testing.

➢ EV Motor & Motor Control: Traction motor design (HV/High Power Density/Hub Motor/ISG/Hybrid), motor control algorithms, and mechanical design of EV transmission systems.

➢ EV Battery & BMS: Battery technology R&D, fuel cell integration, in-house BMS firmware development, and mechanical design for traction batteries.

➢ EV Testing & Validation: Component and vehicle-level testing, HIL & connected systems, control strategy, cloud analytics, and ML applications.

➢ EEE Integration: System-level integration of electrical and electronic components across EV platforms, offering cross-functional exposure to all vehicle systems.

➢ Intelligent Systems: Embedded software, OS & BL development, IoT systems, functional safety, V&V, and advanced algorithm development for EV applications.


Key Responsibilities

➢ Design, prototype, and validate cutting-edge EV hardware and software solutions.

➢ Collaborate with multi-disciplinary teams to develop motors, batteries, electronics, and control systems for next-generation EVs.

➢ Apply model-based design, simulation tools, and software development for EV systems.

➢ Conduct testing, validation, and data analysis to ensure product reliability, efficiency, and safety.

➢ Contribute to innovative solutions that enhance EV performance, energy efficiency, and user experience.

➢ Participate in cross-functional projects to gain exposure to full EV system integration.


What are we looking for?

➢ Technical & Analytical Skills:

  • Solid fundamentals in electrical systems, power electronics, control systems, embedded systems, or EV technologies.
  • Familiarity with MATLAB/Simulink, Python/C/C++, PCB design, motor modeling, or EV system simulations is a plus.

➢ Other Attributes:

  • Adaptable and eager to learn across multiple EV domains.
  • Enthusiastic about driving innovation and shaping the future of electric mobility.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and critical thinking abilities.


What’s in it for you?

➢ Work on world-class EV platforms shaping the future of electric mobility.

➢ Gain exposure to cross-functional EV R&D & Hands-on experience in cutting-edge labs etc.

➢ Opportunity to file patents and contribute to globally recognized innovations.

➢ Be part of a company with a culture of excellence, learning, and career growth.

company_name: Bajaj Auto Limited & Chetak Technology Limited
job_description:
About Operations- Materials

In Bajaj Auto, a large part of the manufacturing is outsourced to its business partners i.e. Vendors. These vendors are managed by Materials (Supply Chain Management) department hence plays a very important role in Manufacturing its products. Materials function in Bajaj Auto is divided first into 2 groups and then into different verticals as per manufacturing processes and horizontals as per below.


Group 1 – Non proprietary

Verticals:

• Casting and Machining 

• Forging and Machining 

• Press & Fabrication

• Polymer & Elastomers 

Horizontals:

• Systems & non-OE Purchase and 

• Raw Materials


Group 2 – Non proprietary

Verticals:

• Electrical and Electronics, 

• Proprietary 


All the verticals are further divided into 3 sub verticals- Purchase, Component development and Quality.


Key Responsibilities

Component Development:


  • ïThe component drawing is released by Research and Development function which is checked for manufacturability and reliability. The drawing is explained to the respective vendors. 
  • ïThe responsible component development engineer gets the new component developed from the vendor as per standard 7 step review process (DR1 to DR7). 
  • ïDuring this development process, the Engineer is required to learn manufacturing processes and tools and apply basic engineering concepts of Engineering drawing, DFA, DFM, PFMEA, DFMEA, 7QC Tools, MSA, SPC techniques, PPAP, QMS etc. along with basic costing concepts.
  • ïThe newly developed is checked at the SIR department (Sample Inspection Report) quality and dimensional accuracies on precision equipments like CMM (Coordinate Measuring Machine). 
  • ïAfter the approval from SIR department, the component manufacturing can be started by the vendor in batch production requirements.


Purchase:


  • ïOnce the component development is understood, the Purchase Engineer studies and applies the cost to develop a component using either of the following 3 costing concepts-
  • ZBC (Zero based costing)
  • ABC (Activity based costing)
  • Project based costing
  • ïThe purchase engineer holds the responsibility of cost of the component, vendor capacity management and quarterly cost amendments.
  • ïDuring this purchasing process, the Engineer is required to learn manufacturing processes and tools and SAP PP/MM.


Vendor Quality Assurance:

  • ïThe manufacturing process followed by vendor is based on IPO document (Input – Process & Output). 
  • ïThe required SOPs are designed by CFT of R&D, CQA, Engineering & VQA department team
  • ïThe VQA team continuously audits the vendors and ensures that, the supplier quality meets BAL requirement.
  • ïDuring this VQA process, the Engineer is required to learn details of manufacturing processes, quality inspection tools and techniques. 

What are we looking for?

  • ïStrong understanding of Mechanical & Automotive fundamentals. 
  • ïFunctional knowledge of manufacturing processes (Casting, Forging, Polymer, Sheet metal forming & Welding)
  • ïKeen interest in learning & implementing new/ emerging technologies.
  • ïStrong Analytical & Problem-solving skills
  • ïGood Documentation and knowledge sharing work habits

What’s in it for you?

  • ïBe part of a structured program designed to fast-track your professional development.
  • ïHands-on Experience: Gain immediate exposure to impactful and meaningful assignments from the very beginning.
  • ïExpert Mentorship: Receive personalized guidance through a mentorship program led by senior leaders and Subject Matter Experts (SMEs).
  • ïLeadership Interaction: Collaborate closely with top business leaders to gain valuable insights into strategic decision-making.
  • ïVendor Collaboration: Work alongside key vendors to understand business processes and partnership dynamics.
  • ïEnd-to-End Business Exposure: Develop a holistic understanding of the full strategic and execution lifecycle.

profile: Flying Start Graduate Trainee Engineer (BAL R&D)
job_description:
About BAL R&D

Bajaj Auto Limited (BAL) runs one of the most advanced automotive R&D centers in Asia, backed by years of expertise in technology, design, and innovation. With 1,500+ engineers and over 1,200 patents across India and 20+ countries, BAL R&D is the powerhouse driving Bajaj’s reputation as a global leader in engineering excellence. By continuously investing in infrastructure, digital tools, and talent, Bajaj R&D sets new benchmarks in performance, reliability, and future-ready mobility solutions. There are primarily 2 areas that BAL R&D GTEs can be deployed in, Design and Testing & Validation.

As a Graduate Trainee Engineer (GTE) in Design, you will lead the end-to-end design and development of next-generation Bajaj vehicles — from concept and layout to production readiness. You’ll work in horizontal teams (Powerpack, Structural & Transmission, Rolling Chassis, Engine, Lighting, etc.) or vertical teams (Vehicle, Powertrain), collaborating across disciplines to deliver integrated, production-ready designs. In Testing & Validation, you will ensure that every Bajaj vehicle meets the highest standards of performance, durability, and safety. You’ll work on both physical and virtual validation, pushing designs to their limits and ensuring excellence before they hit the road.


Key Responsibilities

➢ End-to-End Product Development: Lead vehicle and component design from concept definition to production readiness.

➢ Benchmarking & Target Setting: Define weight, cost, and performance goals through competitive benchmarking and ensure adherence to project budgets.

➢ 3D Modeling & Engineering Analysis: Develop layouts, perform vehicle-level calculations, and establish hard points and modular variants.

➢ Design & Validation Planning: Create and execute Design Verification & Validation Plans (DVVPs) and Design Verification Plans (DVPs).

➢ Physical Testing & Validation: Conduct component, system, and full-vehicle testing using advanced rigs and on-road evaluations for durability, NVH, and ride performance.

➢ Virtual Simulation: Use CAE and CFD tools to simulate structural, thermal, and fluid performance, optimizing designs before prototyping.

➢ Electrical & Electronic Validation: Verify EE systems for EMI/EMC compliance and functional reliability.

➢ Prototype to SOP Support: Participate in prototype builds, pilot runs, and Start of Production (SOP) activities, resolving design and manufacturability concerns.

➢ Optimization & Value Engineering: Drive improvements for Durability, NVH, DFA, DFS, DFM, and contribute Value Analysis/Value Engineering (VA/VE) initiatives.

➢ Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with R&D, Manufacturing, Quality, Sourcing, and Testing teams to ensure seamless project execution.

➢ Data-Driven Insights: Analyze test data, prepare technical reports, and contribute to continuous design and process enhancement.


What are we looking for?

➢ Strong fundamentals in Mechanical, Automobile, or related engineering domains.

➢ Knowledge of vehicle systems, design validation, and testing methods.

➢ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

➢ Ability to work independently and in cross-functional teams.

➢ Keen interest in mobility innovation and adopting emerging technologies.


What’s in it for you?

Through the Flying Start Graduate Trainee Engineer Program, you will gain exposure to iconic brands such as Pulsar, Dominar, KTM, Triumph, Platina, Boxer, and Bajaj’s commercial vehicle platforms. You will get the unique opportunity to:

➢ Design and develop motorcycles and vehicles for global markets.

➢ Solve complex engineering problems with real-world impact.

➢ See your ideas come alive on roads across the world.

➢ Benefit from mentorship by senior leaders and subject matter experts.

job_description:
Associate Engineer - Aircraft Data Analytics

🚀 Launch Your Career at 40,000 Feet: Be the Digital Pioneer at Airbus!

Airbus is not just building aircraft; we are defining the future of global mobility. As the largest aeronautics and Space Company in Europe. This is your chance to join a 130,000-strong global force dedicated to creating safer skies.

Are you a graduate who looks at an aircraft and sees not just metal, but a massive stream of data waiting to be unlocked? If you have an Aerospace core, a passion for Digital Transformation, and an excellent coding and data analytics toolkit, this is where you turn theory into flight-critical reality.

#WeMakeItFly

💡 Your Mission: Engineer the Future of Flight Testing

Your Position: Associate Engineer - Aircraft Data Analytics

Your Team: Aircraft Data Analyst Group

You will join the Aircraft Data Analyst Group at Airbus India. Our team is central to the Integration Test & Analytics department, focusing on the rigorous Verification & Validation of integrated aircraft functions. We don’t just analyze data; we leverage data to make aircraft safer and more efficient before they even take off and ensure they continue to be so even in operations.

✨ Your Role: The Digital Transformer 

We are looking for self-starters—driven, inventive engineers ready to own their projects from concept to deployment in a dynamic, transnational setting.

  • Digital Driver: Identify pain points in the tools of verification and validation lifecycle and develop, improve, and suggest alternate, optimized tools to drive our digital transformation agenda. You are the change agent!
  • Rapid-Fire Solutioning: Quickly immerse yourself in the technical needs of aircraft operations. Then, rapidly code, prototype, and deliver concrete, innovative software solutions that solve mission-critical problems.
  • Global Collaboration: Work with transnational stakeholders. Your solutions will be born in India but deployed globally.
  • End-to-End Ownership: Take full responsibility for your code—from the ideation and coding phase right through to rigorous validation, testing, and final deployment.

🛠️ Your Toolkit: The Essentials for Take-Off

Required Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / M.E. in Aerospace, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics or related Engineering.


The Essential Digital Arsenal:

  • Aircraft Obsession: A genuine, non-negotiable passion for aircraft and the aerospace industry.
  • Core Programming Muscle: Proven, advanced proficiency in at least one language (Python or Java). 
  • Data Analytics Prowess: Strong knowledge of Data Analytics concepts and tools (e.g., advanced use of Python libraries, R, SQL).
  • The Soft Skills for a Global Team: Exceptional Interpersonal and Communication Skills to articulate complex technical ideas to diverse international stakeholders.
  • Agility: High Flexibility and Adaptability to quickly master new aircraft systems, evolving artificial intelligence techniques, and pivot to new technical challenges.
  • Open to Learn: We are young and on the lookout for exciting challenges, so be open to a variety of them which requires one to quickly upskill in new technologies.

Bonus Points (The 'Sky's the Limit' Skills):

  • A keen interest in flight operations and system-level technical details.
  • Hands-on experience/awareness in applying Generative Artificial Intelligence / classical Machine Learning in projects.

Stop simulating. Start building. Apply now and code the future with us!

profile: Associate Engineer - Modeling and Simulation Engineer

As a Modeling and Simulation Engineer, you will be responsible for developing simulation models of

different aircraft systems aimed to support system design and testing for engineering teams as well as

enable pilot training for various aircraft programs.

aircraft behaviors.

programs.

SOFT SKILLS:

profile: Associate Engineer -  Flight Controls and Hydraulics Development Engineer
job_description:
Associate Flight Controls and Hydraulics Development Engineer 


As a Flight Controls and Hydraulic Development Engineer, you will be responsible for developing simulation models of flight controls, auto flight, hydraulics and high lift systems aimed to support system design and testing for engineering teams as well as enable pilot training for various aircraft programs. 

The various activities to be performed are: 

● Develop and model flight controls, auto flight, hydraulics and high lift system simulation models 

● V&V of system functions 

● Ensure support for integration of the models on different simulation platforms 

● Define the evolutions of the models based on the evaluation sessions and the change requests 

● Actively work with the system designers, testing teams during V&V campaigns across multiple

aircraft programs 

● Development of tools to support analysis and V&V 


Required Education: 

● B.Tech./M.Tech.in Aerospace, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation and Control 


Required skills and expertise: 

- Basic aerospace domain knowledge 

- Knowledge of flight mechanics, control systems, flight control and guidance 

- Knowledge of Hydraulic Systems, Fluid Dynamics, Thermodynamics 

- Experience in simulation and modeling of behavioral and/or physical systems (e.g. using Matlab, Simulink)

- Experience with programming in C, C++, Matlab 

- Strong problem solving and logical thinking ability 

- Strong interpersonal and communication skills 

- Flexibility and adaptability 

- Ability to work well in a team environment

Job Description:

As an Associate Engineer, you'll contribute to pioneering research, technology development, and complex problem-solving across various aerospace domains. You'll play a crucial part in exploring new concepts, developing innovative solutions, and applying advanced engineering principles to both legacy and next-generation aerospace systems.

The various activities to be performed are: 

  • Contribute to the design, development, and optimization of cutting-edge aerospace components and systems.
  • Perform complex engineering analysis, solve challenging technical problems, and propose innovative solutions.
  • Utilize and apply advanced engineering tools and methodologies for design, analysis, and validation.
  • Participate in technology maturation projects, from concept generation through feasibility studies and prototyping.
  • Collaborate effectively with interdisciplinary engineering teams, including R&D, design, manufacturing, and test.
  • Simulation Development Environment applications development based on AGILE methodology
  • Prepare and present technical reports, documentation, and recommendations to internal and external stakeholders.
  • Stay abreast of industry trends, scientific advancements, and new engineering techniques.
  • Conduct research and analysis on emerging technologies and advanced concepts relevant to aerospace systems.

Required Education: 

● B.Tech. / M.Tech. in Aerospace, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation and Control 

Required skills and expertise: 

- Basic aerospace domain knowledge 

- Experience in simulation and modeling of behavioral and/or physical systems (e.g. using Matlab, Simulink)

- Experience with programming in C, C++, Matlab, java, C #, Python.

- Strong problem solving and logical thinking ability 

- Strong interpersonal and communication skills 

- Flexibility and adaptability 

- Ability to work well in a team environment

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

Associate Fluid & HydroMechanical Engineer 


As a Fluid & HydroMechanical Engineer, you will be responsible for developing simulation models to support system design and testing for engineering teams. Additionally, you can also be responsible for implementing System Engineering principles across different Aircraft Systems such as Landing Gear, Fuel & Air System.

The various activities to be performed are: 

● Develop simulation models 

● V&V of system functions 

● Define the evolutions of the models based on the evaluation sessions and the change requests 

● Actively work with the system designers, testing teams during V&V campaigns across multiple

aircraft programs 

● System Engineering Activities like requirements management using DOORS


Required Education: 

● B.Tech./M.Tech.in Aerospace, Mechanical, Systems Engineering.


Required skills and expertise: 

- Basic aerospace domain knowledge 

- Fluid Dynamics, Thermal engineering, Air System

- knowledge of System Engineering preferably in Aerospace domain

- Knowledge of MATLAB/SIMULINK,C/Python, Data Science (Added Advantage)

- System Verification & Validation

- Strong problem solving and logical thinking ability 

- Strong interpersonal and communication skills 

- Flexibility and adaptability 

- Ability to work well in a team environment

Associate Engineer – Methods & Tools


Team: Airbus India - Methods and Tools

 

Methods and Tools (M&T) is a transverse team working with different core engineering verticals in Airbus. The USP of this team is working in a multi-functional environment providing digital solutions to engineering problems.

 

The USP of the team is people with Core Engineering domain knowledge complemented by software development skills. The team plays an enabler role in various digitization initiatives across Airbus utilizing latest technologies and the domain knowledge they have.

 

Some examples of the digital solutions for various Core Engineering departments are: Data driven designs of wiring, automated routing electrical harnesses, Data Analytics based product aimed at reducing physical tests of material specimens. It also involves developing web based solutions to encapsulate and automate different work flows such flight test planning etc.

 

M&T is also deeply involved as ‘Product Owners (in Agile methodology)’ in developing state of the art digital products for Airlines, MROs, Lessors, Airports etc. in order to optimize Maintenance of aircrafts, provide data driven insights to airlines in predicting maintenance, aircraft health monitoring, data driven reliability analysis of various Aircraft parts.


If you are known to have the following skills:

● Dynamic, proactive, good team player and good communication skills,

● A problem solver,

● Creative, curious and open-minded for change and continuous improvement,

● Interested to learn different software technologies,

● You've found the right place!


Main activities:

● Interact with engineering domain experts and understand business requirements

● Understand business processes and data flows across domains

● Detailing requirements to fit for software development

● Coding!

● Data analysis and algorithm development based on engineering needs

● Follow Agile Development methods


Technical skills required:

● Strong knowledge on data structures

● Good Coding skills on C/ C++/C# / Java

● Python, R (Nice to have)

● Knowledge of database technologies (Nice to have)

● Introduction to AWS / MS Azure (Nice to have)

● Very good analytical and reasoning skills

● Strong communication skills

job_description:
Job Summary: The Cybersecurity Engineer will be part of a global team of security experts driving ‘Security by Design’ philosophy in Eaton product, solutions & services. 

Job Responsibility: Engineer - Cybersecurity will be part of a global team of Cybersecurity experts driving ‘Security by Design’ philosophy in Eaton product and solutions. 

He/she will be responsible for: 

A. Performing Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing on existing and upcoming Eaton products, solutions & services spanning a wide range of technologies including IoT devices, systems & solutions, web applications, mobile applications, thick clients, wireless devices, embedded systems deployed across Eaton electrical sector businesses.

B. Support the Threat Modeling and Risk Assessment exercises with product teams early in the design and development phase to identify applicable cybersecurity requirements across a variety of Mobility related products, systems & solutions.

C. Support the certification OR compliance of Eaton products under schemes like UL2900, IEC62443 and other emerging standards.

D. Building tools, scripts and automation frameworks around security to achieve Eaton-scale impact.

E. Evangelizing and providing technical security trainings to software developers and test engineers across the organization and evangelizing the importance of cybersecurity in other functions like sales, services and product & project management.

G. Monitoring evolving threat landscape, cybersecurity technologies, standards, frameworks and drive continuous improvement in Eaton’s cybersecurity requirements, frameworks and processes. 

H. Support Cybersecurity Project management & OpEX processes to help drive efficiencies, optimizations & continuous improvements in CCoE's various processes & engagements

Qualification:  Master’s degree in computer science, Electronics Engineering, Electrical Engineering.

Technical Knowledge: The engineer should be - 

1) Able to work independently on these product certifications with minimal guidance.

2) Able to perform cybersecurity testing required for Eaton products with minimal guidance.

3) Able to produce detailed product assessment reports with descriptions, mitigations etc, for product teams.

4) 7) Able to understand technical cybersecurity concepts in depth and be able to apply those concepts to Eaton products for cybersecurity testing.

5) Able to support Threat Modeling and Risk Assessment for Eaton products

6) Having hands-on experience in various Cybersecurity activities including but not limited to - Cybersecurity assessments and penetration testing; Authentication and access control; Applied cryptography and security protocols; secure coding; preferably on embedded, ICS and IoT products. 

7) Having hands on expertise with cybersecurity tools like Nessus, Black Duck, Defensics, Nessus, Burpsuite, Coverity, Kali Linux etc. 

8) Having Good understanding of security protocols (HTTPS, HSTS, TLS, SSH, 802.11 security, Bluetooth, Zigbee) and ICS protocols (IEC 61850, DNP3, Modbus, WirelessHART, CAN)

9) Having knowledge of attacks and mitigation in : Network protocols and secure network design; Operating system internals and hardening (e.g. Windows, Linux, OS X, Android); Web application and browser security.

10) Having certifications like CEH, OSCP is a plus.
perks: Accommodation for initial 14 days for out stationed candidates, Transportation to and fro, medical insurance, Food coupon

Glossary:

1) Relationship Manager (RM) – one who develops & manage client

relationship to enhance & acquire more asset under management

2) Management Trainee (MT) – one who supports RM in building book

or helps to grow wealth management business

3) Anand Rathi Wealth Management (ARWL) – Term used for Wealth

management business

An Management Trainee (MT) role is to support the RM in maintaining and

building the RM wealth management business.

Role:

1) Financial Planning, Portfolio Strategy and Reporting

a. Assisting the RM in making financial plans for clients

keeping in mind

i. Client requirement and

ii. Our 2-point strategy by following the 6-step process

b. Reporting the performance of the portfolio on regular

intervals and highlighting the asset allocation and IRR.

c. Highlighting to the RM, client wise, how client’s actual

portfolio is in variance with the strategic plan and actionable to

get the portfolio aligned to the strategic portfolio

2) Identifying opportunities within the client existing portfolio based on

product team recommendations across –

a. Mutual Funds,

b. Structured Product,

c. Change in the house view on various asset classes

d. Alternatives

3) Support the RM in business development –

a. Help acquire a database of prospective clients

b. Maintain the database of referrals

4) Documentation –

a. Filling up and executing Mutual funds transactions of clients,

including non-financial transactions (like change of bank

mandate)

b. Filling up and executing transactions of the clients.

c. Opening broking account

5) Attending client queries


Career Progression for MT

• Vertical Growth - For every candidate the firm will provide them the

opportunity to become RMs within span of 2-3 Years.

• Horizontal Growth - Candidate has an opportunity to apply for Product

specialist role after a span of 2-3 years

• Personal Wealth building - RM’s who spend more than a decade in

organization potentially end up making CTC of 1 crore +

Quantitative Strategist

Quadeye is a leading algorithmic trading firm with its presence across all global exchanges. Our engineers translate their understanding of financial markets into automated trading strategies across multiple asset classes & instruments using advanced mathematical techniques. We are talented entrepreneurial individuals with a knack of numbers and genius coders who love to design resilient and robust trading systems.

Quadeye is a place of deep curiosity, high expectations, no-hierarchy and constant collaboration with some of the smartest engineers who are empowered to innovate with the help of best resources, mentors and technology.

The strategies would be targeted to explore different exchanges, asset classes and frequencies. You will be working with other exceptional software and quantitative professionals and solve some of the most challenging engineering problems.

job_description:
Kotak Data Labs plays a pivotal role in driving innovation and business growth at Kotak. The team collaborates with stakeholders and data providers, leveraging advanced analytics and Data Science / Machine Learning techniques to drive strategic decision-making across the bank. The core work charter includes supporting different products across the bank by developing solutions across the customer journey to drive Acquisition, Engagement and Retention using cutting-edge Data Science capabilities and Data platforms.

 

The Data Scientist and Data Analyst role within the team involves deploying projects from conception to actionable insights, enabling data-driven marketing strategies, developing risk scorecards, building behavioral models and impact in the banking business. This role focuses on leveraging Data science techniques for model development, feature engineering, driving automation, process improvement, and operational efficiency while demonstrating innovative thinking, passion for data science and fostering cross-team collaboration. Establishing strong working relationship with stakeholders in the bank is also a key aspect of this role.

 

 

Roles and Responsibilities:

·      Deliver end to end Data Science/Analytics projects including understanding of business requirements, exploratory data analysis, data processing, aggregating data, feature engineering, building and validating predictive models, explaining model results & insights and deployment

·      Use AI, ML, DL techniques such as regression, classification, clustering, tree-based algorithms, support vector machine, and neural networks, recommender system, attribution modelling to address business problems.

·      Improve upon existing methodologies by developing new data sources/features, testing model enhancements, and fine-tuning model parameters.

·      Provide requirements to develop analytical capabilities, platforms, and pipelines.

·      Present insights and recommendations to audiences of varying levels of technical sophistication

·      Automate processes to ensure scalability of solutions by collaborating with cross-functional teams

·      Perform the data extraction, transformations, and loading from the source systems and the data lake to the analytics products using independently developed logic

·      Challenge the status quo with entrepreneurial innovation in curating new data sources, elevating analytics beyond data reporting and dashboarding to deliver actionable insights
